9758612Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Random1_1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // FieldsDi2015NewLine    private int inext;Di2015NewLine    private int inextp;Di2015NewLine    private const int MBIG = 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine    private const int MSEED = 0x9a4ec86;Di2015NewLine    private const int MZ = 0x0;Di2015NewLine    private int[] SeedArray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // MethodsDi2015NewLine    public Random1_1()Di2015NewLine        : this(Environment.TickCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Random1_1(int Seed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.SeedArray = new int[0x38];Di2015NewLine        int num2 = 0x9a4ec86 - Math.Abs(Seed);Di2015NewLine        this.SeedArray[0x37] = num2;Di2015NewLine        int num3 = 0x1;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0x1; i < 0x37; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = (0x15 * i) % 0x37;Di2015NewLine            this.SeedArray[index] = num3;Di2015NewLine            num3 = num2 - num3;Di2015NewLine            if (num3 < 0x0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num3 += 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            num2 = this.SeedArray[index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0x1; j < 0x5; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int k = 0x1; k < 0x38; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.SeedArray[k] -= this.SeedArray[0x1 + ((k + 0x1e) % 0x37)];Di2015NewLine                if (this.SeedArray[k] < 0x0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.SeedArray[k] += 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.inext = 0x0;Di2015NewLine        this.inextp = 0x15;Di2015NewLine        Seed = 0x1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual int Next()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (int)(this.Sample() * 2147483647.0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual int Next(int maxValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (maxValue < 0x0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("maxValue");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (int)(this.Sample() * maxValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual int Next(int minValue, int maxValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (minValue > maxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minValue");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int num = maxValue - minValue;Di2015NewLine        if (num < 0x0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long num2 = maxValue - minValue;Di2015NewLine            return (((int)((long)(this.Sample() * num2))) + minValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (((int)(this.Sample() * num)) + minValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void NextBytes(byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("buffer");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0x0; i < buffer.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[i] = (byte)(this.Sample() * 256.0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual double NextDouble()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Sample();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual double Sample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int inext = this.inext;Di2015NewLine        int inextp = this.inextp;Di2015NewLine        if (++inext >= 0x38)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inext = 0x1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (++inextp >= 0x38)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inextp = 0x1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int num = this.SeedArray[inext] - this.SeedArray[inextp];Di2015NewLine        if (num < 0x0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num += 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.SeedArray[inext] = num;Di2015NewLine        this.inext = inext;Di2015NewLine        this.inextp = inextp;Di2015NewLine        return (num * 4.6566128752457969E-10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9763311Di2015UniqueSeparatorGuid userGuid; // value comes from your databaseDi2015NewLineConvertToBase64WebSafeString(userGuid.ToByteArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts to data buffer to a base64-encoded string, using web safe characters and with the padding removed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data">The data buffer.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A web-safe base64-encoded string without padding.</returns>Di2015NewLine    internal static string ConvertToBase64WebSafeString(byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder(Convert.ToBase64String(data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Swap out the URL-unsafe characters, and trim the padding characters.Di2015NewLine        builder.Replace('+', '-').Replace('/', '_');Di2015NewLine        while (builder[builder.Length - 1] == '=') { // should happen at most twice.Di2015NewLine            builder.Length -= 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9763311Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring base64SegmentFromUrl; // from incoming web request to profile pageDi2015NewLineGuid userGuid = new Guid(FromBase64WebSafeString(base64SegmentFromUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Decodes a (web-safe) base64-string back to its binary buffer form.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="base64WebSafe">The base64-encoded string.  May be web-safe encoded.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A data buffer.</returns>Di2015NewLine    internal static byte[] FromBase64WebSafeString(string base64WebSafe) {Di2015NewLine        Requires.NotNullOrEmpty(base64WebSafe, "base64WebSafe");Di2015NewLine        Contract.Ensures(Contract.Result<byte[]>() != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Restore the padding characters and original URL-unsafe characters.Di2015NewLine        int missingPaddingCharacters;Di2015NewLine        switch (base64WebSafe.Length % 4) {Di2015NewLine            case 3:Di2015NewLine                missingPaddingCharacters = 1;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 2:Di2015NewLine                missingPaddingCharacters = 2;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine                missingPaddingCharacters = 0;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw ErrorUtilities.ThrowInternal("No more than two padding characters should be present for base64.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder(base64WebSafe, base64WebSafe.Length + missingPaddingCharacters);Di2015NewLine        builder.Replace('-', '+').Replace('_', '/');Di2015NewLine        builder.Append('=', missingPaddingCharacters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Convert.FromBase64String(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9768902Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class ServerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Thread _listenThread;Di2015NewLine        private readonly TcpListener _tcpListener;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Server()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _tcpListener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, 3000);Di2015NewLine            _listenThread = new Thread(Listen);Di2015NewLine            _listenThread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Listen()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tcpListener = _tcpListener;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (tcpListener != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcpListener.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TcpClient client = _tcpListener.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine                Console.Out.WriteLine("Connection Accepted");Di2015NewLine                Thread clientThread = new Thread(DoWork);Di2015NewLine                clientThread.Start(client);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DoWork(object client)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TcpClient tcpClient = client as TcpClient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (tcpClient == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("client", "Must pass client in");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (NetworkStream clientStream = tcpClient.GetStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] message = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Out.WriteLine("Waiting for message");Di2015NewLine                    int bytesRead = clientStream.Read(message, 0, 1024);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ASCIIEncoding encoder = new ASCIIEncoding();Di2015NewLine                    string received = encoder.GetString(message, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Out.WriteLine(String.Format("Read {0}", received));Di2015NewLine                    if (received.Equals("Hello Server !"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        byte[] buffer = encoder.GetBytes("Hello Client!");Di2015NewLine                        clientStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                        clientStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9769810Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLineBuild(string propertyName, string method, params object[] args) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var e = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "e");Di2015NewLine    var m = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(e, propertyInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var mi = m.Type.GetMethod(method, args.Select(a => a.GetType()).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    var c = args.Select(a => Expression.Constant(a, a.GetType())).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression call = Expression.Call(m, mi, c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(call, e);Di2015NewLine    return lambda;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9772932Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T To<T>(this object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (t.IsGenericType && t.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Nullable type.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // you may want to do something different here.Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the type that was made nullable.Di2015NewLine            Type valueType = t.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert to the value type.Di2015NewLine            object result = Convert.ChangeType(value, valueType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Cast the value type to the nullable type.Di2015NewLine            return (T)result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Not nullable.Di2015NewLine        return (T)Convert.ChangeType(value, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

9774999Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<IGrouping<object, T>> GroupBy<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), String.Empty);Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression property = Expression.PropertyOrField(param, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    UnaryExpression convert = Expression.Convert(property, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    LambdaExpression group = Expression.Lambda(convert, param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodCallExpression call = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine        typeof(Queryable),Di2015NewLine        "GroupBy",Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(T), typeof(object) },Di2015NewLine        source.Expression,Di2015NewLine        Expression.Quote(group));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.Provider.CreateQuery<IGrouping<object, T>>(call);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9775057Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int[]> list = new List<int[]>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new[] { 1, 2, 3 },Di2015NewLine            new[] { 4, 5, 6 },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[,] array = CreateRectangularArray(list);Di2015NewLine        foreach (int x in array)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(x); // 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(array[1, 2]); // 6Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static T[,] CreateRectangularArray<T>(IList<T[]> arrays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // TODO: Validation and special-casing for arrays.Count == 0Di2015NewLine        int minorLength = arrays[0].Length;Di2015NewLine        T[,] ret = new T[arrays.Count, minorLength];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < arrays.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var array = arrays[i];Di2015NewLine            if (array.Length != minorLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentExceptionDi2015NewLine                    ("All arrays must be the same length");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < minorLength; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ret[i, j] = array[j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9777998Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> BuildEmailAddressLambda<T>(Di2015NewLine    string member, IEnumerable<object> memberArgs, string method, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var e = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "e");Di2015NewLine    var memberInfo =Di2015NewLine        (MemberInfo) typeof(T).GetField(member) ??Di2015NewLine        (MemberInfo) typeof(T).GetProperty(member) ??Di2015NewLine        (MemberInfo) typeof(T).GetMethod(member, (memberArgs ?? Enumerable.Empty<object>()).Select(p => p.GetType()).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    Expression m;Di2015NewLine    if (memberInfo.MemberType == MemberTypes.Method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var a = memberArgs.Select(p => Expression.Constant(p));Di2015NewLine        m = Expression.Call(e, (MethodInfo) memberInfo, a);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(e, memberInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var mi = m.Type.GetMethod(method, args.Select(a => a.GetType()).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    var c = args.Select(a => Expression.Constant(a, a.GetType()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Expression.Call(m, mi, c), e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// called:Di2015NewLinelambda = LambdaExpressionHelper<MailingListMember>.BuildEmailAddressLambda("EmailAddress", null, "StartsWith", "r", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine// orDi2015NewLinelambda = LambdaExpressionHelper<MailingListMember>.BuildEmailAddressLambda("GetStringValue", new object[] { 12 }, "StartsWith", "r", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine

9779067Di2015UniqueSeparator[ExportSyntaxNodeCodeIssueProvider("PropertyExpressionCodeIssue", LanguageNames.CSharp, typeof(InvocationExpressionSyntax))]Di2015NewLineclass PropertyExpressionCodeIssueProvider : ICodeIssueProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ImportingConstructor]Di2015NewLine    public PropertyExpressionCodeIssueProvider()Di2015NewLine    {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<CodeIssue> GetIssues(IDocument document, CommonSyntaxNode node, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invocation = (InvocationExpressionSyntax)node;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var semanticModel = document.GetSemanticModel(cancellationToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var semanticInfo = semanticModel.GetSemanticInfo(invocation, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var methodSymbol = (MethodSymbol)semanticInfo.Symbol;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (methodSymbol == null)Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var attributes = methodSymbol.GetAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!attributes.Any(a => a.AttributeClass.Name == "PropertyExpressionAttribute"))Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var arguments = invocation.ArgumentList.Arguments;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var argument in arguments)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lambdaExpression = argument.Expression as SimpleLambdaExpressionSyntax;Di2015NewLine            if (lambdaExpression == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var parameter = lambdaExpression.Parameter;Di2015NewLine            var memberAccess = lambdaExpression.Body as MemberAccessExpressionSyntax;Di2015NewLine            if (memberAccess != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var objectIdentifierSyntax = memberAccess.Expression as IdentifierNameSyntax;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (objectIdentifierSyntax != nullDi2015NewLine                    && objectIdentifierSyntax.PlainName == parameter.Identifier.ValueTextDi2015NewLine                    && semanticModel.GetSemanticInfo(memberAccess, cancellationToken).Symbol is PropertySymbol)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield returnDi2015NewLine                new CodeIssue(Di2015NewLine                    CodeIssue.Severity.Error, argument.Span,Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("Has to be simple property access of '{0}'", parameter.Identifier.ValueText));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Unimplemented ICodeIssueProvider membersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<CodeIssue> GetIssues(IDocument document, CommonSyntaxToken token, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<CodeIssue> }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9779799Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CenterConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (values[0] == DependencyProperty.UnsetValue || values[1] == DependencyProperty.UnsetValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DependencyProperty.UnsetValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double width = (double) values[0];Di2015NewLine        double height = (double)values[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Thickness(-width/2, -height/2, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

MAXIMUM_EXECUTION_TIME)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //error in vba or maximum time reached. abort excel and return 1 to the calling windows forms applicationDi2015NewLine           GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine           GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLine           if (book != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               book.Close(false,Type.Missing, null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               int hWnd = excelApp.Hwnd;Di2015NewLine               uint processID;Di2015NewLine               GetWindowThreadProcessId((IntPtr)hWnd,out processID);Di2015NewLine               if (processID != 0)Di2015NewLine                   Process.GetProcessById((int)processID).Kill();Di2015NewLine                excelApp =null;Di2015NewLine                exitCode = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine       elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            myTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   void RunExcelReporting(int x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myTimer =new Timer(SLEEP_AMOUNT);Di2015NewLine        elapsedTime = 0;Di2015NewLine 9789332Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static ObjectIDGenerator ObjectIDGen = new ObjectIDGenerator();Di2015NewLine
9789332Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool firstTime;Di2015NewLinelong classInstanceID = ObjectIDGenerator.GetId(args.Instance, out firstTime);Di2015NewLine
9789332Di2015UniqueSeparator    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLine    using System.Reflection;Di2015NewLine    using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;Di2015NewLine    using System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLine    using System.Text;Di2015NewLine    using System.Threading;Di2015NewLine    using MyLogType;Di2015NewLine    using PostSharp.Aspects;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLine    using PostSharp.Extensibility;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    namespace DemoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Example code based on the page from a Google search of:Di2015NewLine        /// postsharp "Example: Tracing Method Execution"Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [Serializable]Di2015NewLine        public sealed class MyThreadSafetyCheck : OnMethodBoundaryAspectDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// We need to be able to track if a different ThreadID is seen when executing a method within the *same* instance of a class. ItsDi2015NewLine            /// ok if we see different ThreadID values when accessing different instances of a class. In fact, creating one copy of a class perDi2015NewLine            /// thread is a reliable method to fix threading issues in the first place.Di2015NewLine            /// Di2015NewLine            /// Key: unique ID for every instance of every class.Di2015NewLine            /// Value: LastThreadID, tracks the ID of the last thread which accessed the current instance of this class.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            public static ConcurrentDictionary<long, int> DetectThreadingIssues = new ConcurrentDictionary<long, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Allows us to generate a unique ID for each instance of every class that we see.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            public static ObjectIDGenerator ObjectIDGenerator = new ObjectIDGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// These fields are initialized at runtime. They do not need to be serialized.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            [NonSerialized]Di2015NewLine            private string MethodName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [NonSerialized]Di2015NewLine            private long LastTotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Stopwatch which we can use to avoid swamping the log with too many messages for threading violations.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            [NonSerialized]Di2015NewLine            private Stopwatch sw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Invoked only once at runtime from the static constructor of type declaring the target method. Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="method"></param>Di2015NewLine            public override void RuntimeInitialize(MethodBase method)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (method.DeclaringType != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.MethodName = method.DeclaringType.FullName + "." + method.Name;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine                this.sw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.LastTotalMilliseconds = -1000000;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Invoked at runtime before that target method is invoked.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="args">Arguments to the function.</param>   Di2015NewLine            public override void OnEntry(MethodExecutionArgs args)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (args.Instance == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (this.MethodName.Contains(".ctor"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Ignore the thread that accesses the constructor.Di2015NewLine                    // If we remove this check, then we get a false positive.Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool firstTime;Di2015NewLine                long classInstanceID = ObjectIDGenerator.GetId(args.Instance, out firstTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (firstTime)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // This the first time we have called this, there is no LastThreadID. Return.Di2015NewLine                    if (DetectThreadingIssues.TryAdd(classInstanceID, Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId) == false)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(string.Format("{0}Error E20120320-1349. Could not add an initial key to the \\"DetectThreadingIssues\\" dictionary.\\n",Di2015NewLine                            MyLog.NPrefix()));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int lastThreadID = DetectThreadingIssues[classInstanceID];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Check 1: Continue if this instance of the class was accessed by a different thread (which is definitely bad).Di2015NewLine                if (lastThreadID != Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Check 2: Are we printing more than one message per second?Di2015NewLine                    if ((sw.ElapsedMilliseconds - this.LastTotalMilliseconds) > 1000)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(string.Format("{0}Warning: ThreadID {1} then {2} accessed \\"{3}\\". To remove warning, manually check thread safety, then add \\"[MyThreadSafetyCheck(AttributeExclude = true)]\\".\\n",Di2015NewLine                            MyLog.NPrefix(), lastThreadID, Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, this.MethodName));Di2015NewLine                        this.LastTotalMilliseconds = sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Update the value of "LastThreadID" for this particular instance of the class.Di2015NewLine                DetectThreadingIssues[classInstanceID] = Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9792022Di2015UniqueSeparator public class UsernameDecryptorDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine      public string Decrypt(string cipherText)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine           if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(cipherText))Di2015NewLine                return cipherText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           byte[] salt = new byte[]Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                (byte)0xc7,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0x73,Di2015NewLine                 (byte)0x21,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0x8c,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0x7e,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0xc8,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0xee,Di2015NewLine                (byte)0x99Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PKCSKeyGenerator crypto = new PKCSKeyGenerator("PASSWORD HERE", salt, 20, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform cryptoTransform = crypto.Decryptor;Di2015NewLine            byte[] cipherBytes = System.Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLine            byte[] clearBytes = cryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock(cipherBytes, 0, cipherBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(clearBytes);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

9796555Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyAuthClass {Di2015NewLine  private const int SaltSize = 40;Di2015NewLine  private ThreadLocal<HashAlgorithm> Hasher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public MyAuthClass ()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // This is 'ThreadLocal' so your methods which use this are thread-safe.Di2015NewLine    Hasher = new ThreadLocal<HashAlgorithm>( Di2015NewLine      () => new HMACSHA256(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(_configurationProvider.PasswordEncryptionKey)Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine  } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public User CreateUser(string email, string password) {Di2015NewLine    var rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    var pwBytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(password);Di2015NewLine    var salt = new byte[SaltSize];Di2015NewLine    rng.GetBytes(salt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var hasher = Hasher.Value;Di2015NewLine    hasher.TransformBlock(salt, 0, SaltSize, salt, 0);Di2015NewLine    hasher.TransformFinalBlock(pwBytes, 0, pwBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    var finalHash = hasher.Hash;Di2015NewLine    return new User { UserName = email, PasswordHash = finalHash, Salt = salt };Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine
9796555Di2015UniqueSeparator  public bool IsPasswordCorrect(User u, string attempt) Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var hasher = Hasher.Value;Di2015NewLine    var pwBytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(attempt);Di2015NewLine    hasher.TransformBlock(u.Salt, 0, u.Salt.Length, Salt, 0);Di2015NewLine    hasher.TransformFinalBlock(pwBytes, 0, pwBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    // LINQ method that checks element equality.Di2015NewLine    return hasher.Hash.SequenceEqual(u.PasswordHash);  Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine} // end MyAuthClassDi2015NewLine

9799744Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const byte InverseBlueMask = 7; // 00000111Di2015NewLine    private const byte InverseGreenMask = 3; // 00000011Di2015NewLine    private const byte InverseRedMask = 7; //  00000111Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void getEachBitOfMessage(byte byteToManipulate, int colour)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte value = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (countToByte == 3)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte blueAreaInTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte greenAreaInTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte redAreaInTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte total = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            redAreaInTotal = (byte)(redCount);Di2015NewLine            blueAreaInTotal = (byte)(blueCount << 5);Di2015NewLine            greenAreaInTotal = (byte)(greenCount << 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            total = (byte)(total | redAreaInTotal); Di2015NewLine            total = (byte)(total | blueAreaInTotal);Di2015NewLine            total = (byte)(total | greenAreaInTotal); Di2015NewLine            convertToChar(total);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            redCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            blueCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            greenCount = 0; Di2015NewLine            countToByte = 0; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (colour == BLUE)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (byte)(byteToManipulate & InverseBlueMask);Di2015NewLine            blueCount = value; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (colour == GREEN)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (byte)(byteToManipulate & InverseGreenMask);Di2015NewLine            greenCount = value; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (colour == RED)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (byte)(byteToManipulate & InverseRedMask);Di2015NewLine            redCount = value; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        countToByte++; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9801714Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime FirstDateOfWeek(int year, int weekOfYear)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime jan1 = new DateTime(year, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine    int daysOffset = Convert.ToInt32(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.FirstDayOfWeek) - Convert.ToInt32(jan1.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine    DateTime firstWeekDay = jan1.AddDays(daysOffset);Di2015NewLine    System.Globalization.CultureInfo curCulture = System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture;Di2015NewLine    int firstWeek = curCulture.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear(jan1, curCulture.DateTimeFormat.CalendarWeekRule, curCulture.DateTimeFormat.FirstDayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine    if (firstWeek <= 1) {Di2015NewLine        weekOfYear -= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return firstWeekDay.AddDays(weekOfYear * 7);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9801719Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var adjList = new List<Link>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Link("A","A1"),Di2015NewLine        new Link("A","A2"),Di2015NewLine        new Link("A","A3"),Di2015NewLine        new Link("A3","A31"),Di2015NewLine        new Link("A31","A311"),Di2015NewLine        new Link("A31","A312"),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rootsAndChildren = adjList.GroupBy(x => x.From)Di2015NewLine           .ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x => x.Select(y => y.To).ToList());Di2015NewLine    var roots = rootsAndChildren.KeysDi2015NewLine           .Except(rootsAndChildren.SelectMany(x => x.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var wr = new StreamWriter("C:\\\\myjson.json"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        wr.WriteLine("{");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var root in roots)Di2015NewLine            AppendSubNodes(wr, root, rootsAndChildren, 1);Di2015NewLine        wr.WriteLine("};");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void AppendSubNodes(TextWriter wr, string root, Di2015NewLine          Dictionary<string, List<string>> rootsAndChildren, int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string indent = string.Concat(Enumerable.Repeat(" ", level * 4));Di2015NewLine    wr.Write(indent + "\\"name\\" : \\"" + root + "\\"");Di2015NewLine    List<string> children;Di2015NewLine    if (rootsAndChildren.TryGetValue(root, out children))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        wr.WriteLine(",");Di2015NewLine        wr.WriteLine(indent + "\\"children\\" : [{");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; 9801719Di2015UniqueSeparatorTarjan
9801719Di2015UniqueSeparator// Please note that Tarjan does not detect a cycle due to a node Di2015NewLine// pointing to itself. It's pretty trivial to account for that though...Di2015NewLinepublic class Tarjan<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public T Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Index { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int LowLink { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Node(T value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Value = value;Di2015NewLine            this.Index = -1;Di2015NewLine            this.LowLink = -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> getSuccessors;Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T, Node> nodeMaps;Di2015NewLine    private int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    private Stack<Node> stack;Di2015NewLine    private List<List<Node>> SCC;Di2015NewLine    public bool HasCycle(IEnumerable<T> nodes, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> getSuccessors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ExecuteTarjan(nodes, getSuccessors).Any(x => x.Count > 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private List<List<Node>> ExecuteTarjan(IEnumerable<T> nodes, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> getSuccessors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.nodeMaps = nodes.ToDictionary(x => x, x => new Node(x));Di2015NewLine        this.getSuccessors = getSuccessors;Di2015NewLine        SCC = new List<List<Node>>();Di2015NewLine        stack = new Stack<Node>();Di2015NewLine        index = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var node in this.nodeMaps.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Index == -1)Di2015NewLine                TarjanImpl(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return SCC;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<Node> GetSuccessors(Node v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.getSuccessors(v.Value).Select(x => this.nodeMaps[x]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private List<List<Node>> TarjanImpl(Node v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        v.Index = index;Di2015NewLine        v.LowLink = index;Di2015NewLine        index++;Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(v);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var n in GetSuccessors(v))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (n.Index == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TarjanImpl(n);Di2015NewLine                v.LowLink = Math.Min(v.LowLink, n.LowLink);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (stack.Contains(n))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                v.LowLink = Math.Min(v.LowLink, n.Index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (v.LowLink == v.Index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Node n;Di2015NewLine            List<Node> component = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                n = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine                component.Add(n);Di2015NewLine            } while (n != v);Di2015NewLine            SCC.Add(component);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return SCC;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9802346Di2015UniqueSeparator[TemplatePart(Name = "PART_ItemsHolder", Type = typeof(Panel))]Di2015NewLinepublic class TabControlEx : TabControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Panel ItemsHolderPanel = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TabControlEx()Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is necessary so that we get the initial databound selected itemDi2015NewLine        ItemContainerGenerator.StatusChanged += ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// If containers are done, generate the selected itemDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.ItemContainerGenerator.Status == GeneratorStatus.ContainersGenerated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ItemContainerGenerator.StatusChanged -= ItemContainerGenerator_StatusChanged;Di2015NewLine            UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get the ItemsHolder and generate any childrenDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void OnApplyTemplate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnApplyTemplate();Di2015NewLine        ItemsHolderPanel = GetTemplateChild("PART_ItemsHolder") as Panel;Di2015NewLine        UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// When the items change we remove any generated panel children and add any new ones as necessaryDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnItemsChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnItemsChanged(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ItemsHolderPanel == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                ItemsHolderPanel.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                if (e.OldItems != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var item in e.OldItems)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ContentPresenter cp = FindChildContentPresenter(item);Di2015NewLine                        if (cp != null)Di2015NewLine                            ItemsHolderPanel.Children.Remove(cp);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Don't do anything with new items because we don't want toDi2015NewLine                // create visuals that aren't being shownDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException("Replace not implemented yet");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnSelectionChanged(SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnSelectionChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        UpdateSelectedItem();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UpdateSelectedItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ItemsHolderPanel == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate a ContentPresenter if necessaryDi2015NewLine        TabItem item = GetSelectedTabItem();Di2015NewLine        if (item != null)Di2015NewLine            CreateChildContentPresenter(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // show the right childDi2015NewLine        foreach (ContentPresenter child in ItemsHolderPanel.Children)Di2015NewLine            child.Visibility = ((child.Tag as TabItem).IsSelected) ? Visibility.Visible : Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ContentPresenter CreateChildContentPresenter(object item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (item == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ContentPresenter cp = FindChildContentPresenter(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cp != null)Di2015NewLine            return cp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the actual child to be added.  cp.Tag is a reference to the TabItemDi2015NewLine        cp = new ContentPresenter();Di2015NewLine        cp.Content = (item is TabItem) ? (item as TabItem).Content : item;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentTemplate = this.SelectedContentTemplate;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentTemplateSelector = this.SelectedContentTemplateSelector;Di2015NewLine        cp.ContentStringFormat = this.SelectedContentStringFormat;Di2015NewLine        cp.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        cp.Tag = (item is TabItem) ? item : (this.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(item));Di2015NewLine        ItemsHolderPanel.Children.Add(cp);Di2015NewLine        return cp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ContentPresenter FindChildContentPresenter(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data is TabItem)Di2015NewLine            data = (data as TabItem).Content;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (data == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ItemsHolderPanel == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ContentPresenter cp in ItemsHolderPanel.Children)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (cp.Content == data)Di2015NewLine                return cp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected TabItem GetSelectedTabItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object selectedItem = base.SelectedItem;Di2015NewLine        if (selectedItem == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TabItem item = selectedItem as TabItem;Di2015NewLine        if (item == null)Di2015NewLine            item = base.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(base.SelectedIndex) as TabItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9804034Di2015UniqueSeparatorIComparer<T>
9804034Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PersonComparer : IComparer<Person>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly bool _sortAscending;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _columnToSortOn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PersonComparer(bool sortAscending, string columnToSortOn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sortAscending = sortAscending;Di2015NewLine        _columnToSortOn = columnToSortOn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(Person x, Person y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(x == null && y == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine        if(x == null) return ApplySortDirection(-1);Di2015NewLine        if(y == null) return ApplySortDirection(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch(_columnToSortOn)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "LastName":Di2015NewLine                return ApplySortDirection(SortByName(x, y));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "PostCode":Di2015NewLine                return ApplySortDirection(SortByPostCode(x, y));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("Can't sort on column {0}",Di2015NewLine                    _columnToSortOn));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int SortByPostCode(Person x, Person y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.PostCode.CompareTo(y.PostCode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int SortByName(Person x, Person y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lastNameResult = x.LastName.CompareTo(y.LastName);Di2015NewLine        if(lastNameResult != 0)Di2015NewLine            return lastNameResult;Di2015NewLine        return x.FirstName.CompareTo(y.FirstName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ApplySortDirection(int result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _sortAscending ? result : (result * -1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9809435Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IPropagatorBlock<T, T> CreateDelayBlock<T>(TimeSpan delay)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime lastItem = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    return new TransformBlock<T, T>(Di2015NewLine        async x =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var waitTime = lastItem + delay - DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine                    if (waitTime > TimeSpan.Zero)Di2015NewLine                        await Task.Delay(waitTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    lastItem = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return x;Di2015NewLine                },Di2015NewLine        new ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions { BoundedCapacity = 1 });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9809450Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> MergeSorted<T>(this IEnumerable<T> first, IEnumerable<T> second, Func<T, T, int> comparer) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var firstEnumerator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var secondEnumerator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var elementsLeftInFirst = firstEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        var elementsLeftInSecond = secondEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        while (elementsLeftInFirst || elementsLeftInSecond)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!elementsLeftInFirst)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return secondEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                    } while (secondEnumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!elementsLeftInSecond)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return firstEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                    } while (firstEnumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (comparer(firstEnumerator.Current, secondEnumerator.Current) < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return firstEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                elementsLeftInFirst = firstEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return secondEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                elementsLeftInSecond = secondEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9810020Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    // First we see the input string.Di2015NewLine    string input = "Lorem {placeholder} ipsum {placeholder2} ...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here we call Regex.Match.Di2015NewLine    Match match = Regex.Match(input, @"(?<=\\{)(.*)(?=\\})",Di2015NewLine        RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here we check the Match instance.Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Finally, we get the Group value and display it.Di2015NewLine        foreach(var matchgroup in match.Groups)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(matchgroup.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region elsewhere...Di2015NewLinepublic IntPtr GetWindowsTokenForImpersonation(string username, string password, string domain)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr loginToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr workingToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    bool successDi2015NewLine    if(!RevertToSelf()) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        // failed to eliminate any existing impersonations. 9811936Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //IMold mold = new IMold(); // error - can't create instance of an interfaceDi2015NewLine    //Fruit fruit = new Fruit(); // error - can't create instance of an abstract classDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Apple apple1 = new Apple(); // goodDi2015NewLine    Orange orange1 = new Orange(); // goodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Fruit apple2 = (Fruit)apple1; // good - Apples are fruitDi2015NewLine    Fruit orange2 = (Fruit)orange1; // good - oranges are fruitDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IFruitMold apple3 = (IFruitMold)apple2; // good - Apples fit the MoldDi2015NewLine    IFruitMold orange3 = (IFruitMold)orange2; // good - Oranges also fit the moldDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now I can do this:Di2015NewLine    //Notice that `fruits` is of type IList<T> but the new is List<T>Di2015NewLine    //This is the exact concept we are talking aboutDi2015NewLine    //IList<T> is some kind of set of items that can be added or subtracted fromDi2015NewLine    //but we don't have to care about the implementation details of *HOW* this is doneDi2015NewLine    IList<IFruitMold> fruits = new List<IFruitMold>();Di2015NewLine    fruits.add(apple3);Di2015NewLine    fruits.add(orange3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var fruit in fruits )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fruit.PlasticColor.Dump(); // ok I can readDi2015NewLine        fruit.PlasticColor = ""; // error - no Set defined in the interfaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // depending on the **implementation details** of what type of fruit this is true or falseDi2015NewLine        // we don't care in the slightest, we just care that we have some IFruitMold instancesDi2015NewLine        fruit.RequiresPainting.Dump(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinterface IFruitMoldDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string PlasticColor { get; }Di2015NewLine    bool RequiresPainting { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class Fruit : IFruitMoldDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string m_PlasticColor = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    public string PlasticColor { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public abstract bool RequiresPainting { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//notice that we only define the abstract portion of the base classDi2015NewLine//it defined PlasticColor for us already!Di2015NewLine//the keyword `override` is required  - it is to make it clear that Di2015NewLine//this member is overriding a member from it's parent.Di2015NewLineclass Apple : FruitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool RequiresPainting { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Orange : FruitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool RequiresPainting { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9815891Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<T> Interleave(this IEnumerable<T> a, IEnumerable<T> b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool bEmpty = false;Di2015NewLine    using (var enumeratorB b.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var elementA in a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return elementA;Di2015NewLine            if (!bEmpty && bEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                yield return bEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                bEmpty = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!bEmpty)Di2015NewLine            while (bEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                yield return bEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9819573Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<int, String> Chop(this string str, int minLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (str == null) throw new ArgumentException("str");Di2015NewLine    if (str.Length < minLength) throw new ArgumentException("Length of string less than minLength", "minLength");Di2015NewLine    var dict = str.TakeWhile((c, index) => index <= str.Length - minLength)Di2015NewLine        .Select((c, index) => new { Di2015NewLine            Index = index, Di2015NewLine            Value = str.Substring(0, minLength + index) Di2015NewLine        }).ToDictionary(obj => obj.Index, obj => obj.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dict;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9821698Di2015UniqueSeparator//enum for various patternsDi2015NewLinepublic enum OccurrenceRateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Weekly,Di2015NewLine    Fortnightly,Di2015NewLine    MonthlyDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static List<DateTime> GetOccurrences(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, OccurrenceRate rate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<DateTime> occurrences = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var nextDate = startDate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (nextDate <= endDate)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            occurrences.Add(nextDate);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (rate)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case OccurrenceRate.Weekly:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextDate = nextDate.AddDays(7);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            case OccurrenceRate.Fortnightly:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextDate = nextDate.AddDays(14);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            case OccurrenceRate.Monthly:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextDate = nextDate.AddMonths(1);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return occurrences;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine         RegexOptions.IgnoreCase : Di2015NewLine         RegexOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var match = regex.Match(source);Di2015NewLine  return match.Captures.Count == 0 ? -1 : match.Groups[0].Index;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9831177Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Paragraph ReadParagraph(StreamReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Paragraph paragraph = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLine    paragraph.SheetName = ReadNextValue(reader);Di2015NewLine    paragraph.Process = ReadNextValue(reader);Di2015NewLine    paragraph.Material = ReadNextValue(reader);Di2015NewLine    paragraph.CutQuality = ReadNextValue(reader);Di2015NewLine    return paragraph;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string ReadNextValue(StreamReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return reader.ReadLine().Split('=')[1].Trim();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9832787Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly TimeSpan timeoutPeriod = new TimeSpan(100000); // 10msDi2015NewLineprivate const string filename = "Output.txt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void WriteData(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StreamWriter writer = null;Di2015NewLine    DateTime timeout = DateTime.Now + timeoutPeriod;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Try to open the file.Di2015NewLine                writer = new StreamWriter(filename);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (IOException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If this is taking too long, throw an exception.Di2015NewLine                if (DateTime.Now >= timeout) throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLine                // Let other threads run so one of them can unlock the file.Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (writer == null);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (writer != null) writer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

AppId].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int separator = fbsr.IndexOf(".");Di2015NewLine        if (separator == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string encodedSig = fbsr.Substring(0, separator);Di2015NewLine        string payload = fbsr.Substring(separator + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string sig = Base64Decode(encodedSig);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var serializer = new JavaScriptSerializer();Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, string> data = serializer.Deserialize<Dictionary<string, string>>(Base64Decode(payload));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (data["algorithm"].ToUpper() != "HMAC-SHA256")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HMACSHA256 crypt = new HMACSHA256(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(AppSecret));Di2015NewLine        crypt.ComputeHash(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(payload));Di2015NewLine        string expectedSig = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(crypt.Hash);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (sig != expectedSig)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string accessTokenResponse = FileGetContents("https://graph.facebook.com/oauth/access_token?client_id=" + AppId + "&redirect_uri=&client_secret=" + AppSecret + "&code=" + data["code"]);Di2015NewLine        NameValueCollection options = HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(accessTokenResponse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string userResponse = FileGetContents("https://graph.facebook.com/me?access_token=" + options["access_token"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        userResponse = Regex.Replace(userResponse, @"\\\\u([\\dA-Fa-f]{4})", v => ((char)Convert.ToInt32(v.Groups[1].Value, 16)).ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FacebookUser user = new FacebookUser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Regex getValues = new infoMatch.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getValues = new Regex("(?<=\\"last_name\\":\\")(.+?)(?=\\")");Di2015NewLine        infoMatch = getValues.Match(userResponse);Di2015NewLine        user.LastName = infoMatch.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return user;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected static string FileGetContents(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string result;Di2015NewLine        WebResponse response;Di2015NewLine        WebRequest request = HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            sr.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected static string Base64Decode(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UTF8Encoding encoding = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine        string encoded = input.Replace("=", string.Empty).Replace('-', '+').Replace('_', '/');Di2015NewLine        var decoded = Convert.FromBase64String(encoded.PadRight(encoded.Length + (4 - encoded.Length % 4) % 4, '='));Di2015NewLine        var result = encoding.GetString(decoded);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FacebookUserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string UID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string 9843667Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Shared Function ExtractImages(ByVal sourcePdf As String) As List(Of Image)Di2015NewLine    Dim imgList As New List(Of Image)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim raf As iTextSharp.text.pdf.RandomAccessFileOrArray = NothingDi2015NewLine    Dim reader As iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfReader = NothingDi2015NewLine    Dim pdfObj As iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfObject = NothingDi2015NewLine    Dim pdfStrem As iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfStream = NothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TryDi2015NewLine        raf = New iTextSharp.text.pdf.RandomAccessFileOrArray(sourcePdf)Di2015NewLine        reader = New iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfReader(raf, Nothing)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        For i As Integer = 0 To reader.XrefSize - 1Di2015NewLine            pdfObj = reader.GetPdfObject(i)Di2015NewLine            If Not IsNothing(pdfObj) AndAlso pdfObj.IsStream() ThenDi2015NewLine                pdfStrem = DirectCast(pdfObj, iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfStream)Di2015NewLine                Dim subtype As iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfObject = pdfStrem.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.SUBTYPE)Di2015NewLine                If Not IsNothing(subtype) AndAlso subtype.ToString = iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.IMAGE.ToString ThenDi2015NewLine                    Dim bytes() As Byte = iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfReader.GetStreamBytesRaw(CType(pdfStrem, iTextSharp.text.pdf.PRStream))Di2015NewLine                    If Not IsNothing(bytes) ThenDi2015NewLine                        TryDi2015NewLine                            Using memStream As New System.IO.MemoryStream(bytes)Di2015NewLine                                memStream.Position = 0Di2015NewLine                                Dim img As Image = Image.FromStream(memStream)Di2015NewLine                                imgList.Add(img)Di2015NewLine                            End UsingDi2015NewLine                        Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine                            'Most likely the image is in an unsupported formatDi2015NewLine                            'Do nothingDi2015NewLine                            'You can add your own code to handle this exception if you want toDi2015NewLine                        End TryDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        reader.Close()Di2015NewLine    Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message)Di2015NewLine    End TryDi2015NewLine    Return imgListDi2015NewLineEnd Function Di2015NewLine

9844442Di2015UniqueSeparator// Process the accept for the socket listener.Di2015NewLineprivate void ProcessAccept(SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Socket s = e.AcceptSocket;Di2015NewLine    if (s.Connected)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SocketAsyncEventArgs readEventArgs = this.readWritePool.Pop();Di2015NewLine            if (readEventArgs != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the socket for the accepted client connection and put it into the Di2015NewLine                // ReadEventArg object user token.Di2015NewLine                readEventArgs.UserToken = new Token(s, this.bufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Interlocked.Increment(ref this.numConnectedSockets);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Client connection accepted. Di2015NewLine            There are {0} clients connected to the server",Di2015NewLine                    this.numConnectedSockets);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!s.ReceiveAsync(readEventArgs))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.ProcessReceive(readEventArgs);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("There are no more available sockets to allocate.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Token token = e.UserToken as Token;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error when processing data received from {0}:\\r\\n{1}", Di2015NewLine            token.Connection.RemoteEndPoint, ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Accept the next connection request.Di2015NewLine        this.StartAccept(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9845364Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar A = new List<string> { "Beef", "Ham", "Chicken" };Di2015NewLinevar B = new List<string> { "Cat", "Monkey", "Dog" };Di2015NewLinevar C = new List<string> { "Veal", "Ham", "Beef", "Chicken", "Deer", "Dog", "Cat", "Monkey" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// To quickly check if C[i] belongs to the corresponding list.Di2015NewLinevar sA = new HashSet<string>(A);Di2015NewLinevar sB = new HashSet<string>(B);Di2015NewLineList<string> currentList = null;Di2015NewLineint pos = 1;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < C.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string el = C[i];Di2015NewLine    if (currentList != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pos == currentList.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pos = 1;Di2015NewLine            currentList = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            C[i] = currentList[pos];Di2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (sA.Contains(el))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentList = A;Di2015NewLine        C[i] = currentList[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (sB.Contains(el))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentList = B;Di2015NewLine        C[i] = currentList[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Outputs "Veal,Beef,Ham,Chicken,Deer,Cat,Monkey,Dog"Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Join(",", C));Di2015NewLine

9847010Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetUserIdFromDisplayName(string displayName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // set up domain contextDi2015NewLine    using(PrincipalContext ctx = new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // find user by display nameDi2015NewLine        UserPrincipal user = UserPrincipal.FindByIdentity(ctx, displayName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Di2015NewLine        if (user != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             return user.SamAccountName;Di2015NewLine             // or maybe you need user.UserPrincipalName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine
9847010Di2015UniqueSeparatorDirectoryEntry
9847010Di2015UniqueSeparatorUserPrincipal
9847010Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrincipalSearcher
9847010Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetUserIdFromDisplayName(string displayName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // set up domain contextDi2015NewLine    using(PrincipalContext ctx = new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // define a "query-by-example" principal - here, we search for a UserPrincipal Di2015NewLine        // and with the display name passed inDi2015NewLine        UserPrincipal qbeUser = new UserPrincipal(ctx);Di2015NewLine        qbeUser.DisplayName = displayName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create your principal searcher passing in the QBE principal    Di2015NewLine        PrincipalSearcher srch = new PrincipalSearcher(qbeUser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find match - if existsDi2015NewLine        UserPrincipal user = srch.FindOne() as UserPrincipal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (user != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             return user.SamAccountName;Di2015NewLine             // or maybe you need user.UserPrincipalName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9847039Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ReplaceWithTemplate(this string original, string pattern, string replacement)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var template = Regex.Match(original, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).Value.Remove(0, 1);Di2015NewLine  template = template.Remove(template.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine  var chars = new List<char>();Di2015NewLine  var isLetter = false;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < replacement.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     if (i < (template.Length)) isLetter = Char.IsUpper(template[i]);Di2015NewLine     chars.Add(Convert.ToChar(Di2015NewLine                       isLetter ? Char.ToUpper(replacement[i]) Di2015NewLine                                : Char.ToLower(replacement[i])));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return new string(chars.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9847928Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinqExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Orders the sequence by specific column and direction.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="query">The query.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sortColumn">The sort column.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ascending">if set to true [ascending].</param>Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string sortColumn, string direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string methodName = string.Format("OrderBy{0}",Di2015NewLine            direction.ToLower() == "asc" ? "" : "descending");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(query.ElementType, "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberAccess = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in sortColumn.Split('.'))Di2015NewLine            memberAccess = MemberExpression.PropertyDi2015NewLine               (memberAccess ?? (parameter as Expression), property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LambdaExpression orderByLambda = Expression.Lambda(memberAccess, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression result = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                  typeof(Queryable),Di2015NewLine                  methodName,Di2015NewLine                  new[] { query.ElementType, memberAccess.Type },Di2015NewLine                  query.Expression,Di2015NewLine                  Expression.Quote(orderByLambda));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.Provider.CreateQuery<T>(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> Where<T>(this IQueryable<T> query,Di2015NewLine        string column, object value, WhereOperation operation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(column))Di2015NewLine            return query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(query.ElementType, "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberAccess = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in column.Split('.'))Di2015NewLine            memberAccess = MemberExpression.PropertyDi2015NewLine               (memberAccess ?? (parameter as Expression), property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //change param value typeDi2015NewLine        //necessary to getting bool from stringDi2015NewLine        ConstantExpression filter = Expression.ConstantDi2015NewLine            (Di2015NewLine                Convert.ChangeType(value, memberAccess.Type)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //switch operationDi2015NewLine        Expression condition = null;Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambda = null;Di2015NewLine        switch (operation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //equal ==Di2015NewLine            case WhereOperation.Equal:Di2015NewLine                condition = Expression.Equal(memberAccess, filter);Di2015NewLine                lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            //not equal !=Di2015NewLine            case WhereOperation.NotEqual:Di2015NewLine                condition = Expression.NotEqual(memberAccess, filter);Di2015NewLine                lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            //string.Contains()Di2015NewLine            case WhereOperation.Contains:Di2015NewLine                condition = Expression.Call(memberAccess,Di2015NewLine                    typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains"),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLine                lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression result = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine               typeof(Queryable), "Where",Di2015NewLine               new[] { query.ElementType },Di2015NewLine               query.Expression,Di2015NewLine               lambda);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.Provider.CreateQuery<T>(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9847928Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Service1 : System.Web.Services.WebServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [WebMethod]Di2015NewLine    [ScriptMethod(ResponseFormat = ResponseFormat.Json)]Di2015NewLine    public JgGrid SearchGrid(int rows, int page, string sidx, string sord,string filters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AdvWorksDataContext dc = new AdvWorksDataContext();Di2015NewLine        JavaScriptSerializer serializer = new JavaScriptSerializer();Di2015NewLine        filters f = serializer.Deserialize<filters>(filters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var p = dc.vProductAndDescriptions.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine        if (f.groupOp == "AND")Di2015NewLine            foreach (var rule in f.rules)Di2015NewLine                p = p.Where<vProductAndDescription>(Di2015NewLine                    rule.field, rule.data,Di2015NewLine                    (WhereOperation)StringEnum.Parse(typeof(WhereOperation), rule.op)Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            //OrDi2015NewLine            var temp = (new List<vProductAndDescription>()).AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var rule in f.rules)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var t = p.Where<vProductAndDescription>(Di2015NewLine                    rule.field, rule.data,Di2015NewLine                    (WhereOperation)StringEnum.Parse(typeof(WhereOperation), rule.op)Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine                temp = temp.Concat<vProductAndDescription>(t);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            p = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        p = p.OrderBy<vProductAndDescription>(sidx, sord);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new JgGrid(page, p, rows);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9848143Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ThingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string someValue; // all threads will read and write to this same field valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int NonThreadSafeMethod(string parameter1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.someValue = parameter1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int number;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since access to someValue is not synchronised by the class, a separate threadDi2015NewLine        // could have changed its value between this thread setting its value at the start Di2015NewLine        // of the method and this line reading its value.Di2015NewLine        number = this.someValue.Length;Di2015NewLine        return number;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
