    if (!targetList.Any())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        destination.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Remove itemsDi2015NewLine            foreach (var hitItem in hitList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Remove itemDi2015NewLine                source.Remove(hitItem);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Moves all items from one list to 9848328Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ViewModel<T> : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ObservableCollection<T> _collection1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is the first collection.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<T> Collection1Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _collection1; 9852156Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace COMHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Disposable wrapper for COM interface pointers.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">COM interface type to wrap.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    public class ComPtr<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private object m_oObject;Di2015NewLine        private bool m_bDisposeDone = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// ConstructorDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="oObject"></param>Di2015NewLine        public ComPtr ( T oObject )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( oObject == null )Di2015NewLine                throw ( new ArgumentNullException ( "Invalid reference for ComPtr (cannot be null)" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( !( Marshal.IsComObject ( oObject ) ) )Di2015NewLine                throw ( new ArgumentException ( "Invalid type for ComPtr (must be a COM interface pointer)" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_oObject = oObject;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// ConstructorDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="oObject"></param>Di2015NewLine        public ComPtr ( object oObject ) : this ( (T) oObject )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// DestructorDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        ~ComPtr ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose ( false );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the wrapped object.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public T ObjectDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ( (T) m_oObject );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Implicit cast to type T.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="oObject">Object to cast.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Returns the ComPtr object cast to type T.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static implicit operator T ( ComPtr<T> oObject )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ( oObject.Object );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Frees up resources.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose ()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose ( true );Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize ( this );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Frees up resurces used by the object.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="bDispose">When false, the function is called from the destructor.</param>Di2015NewLine        protected void Dispose ( bool bDispose )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ( !m_bDisposeDone && ( m_oObject != null ) )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Marshal.ReleaseComObject ( m_oObject );Di2015NewLine                    m_oObject = 9852890Di2015UniqueSeparator00000010 00000000 00000000 00000000 01100110 00000010 00000000 00000000Di2015NewLine|              Mask               | |            Address              |Di2015NewLine
9852890Di2015UniqueSeparator[Flags] enum
9852890Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Some test values.Di2015NewLine        ushort address16 = ushort.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        uint address32 = uint.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Upper:Di2015NewLine        ulong valueUpper = address16;           // Value contains 0x000000000000FFFFDi2015NewLine        valueUpper = valueUpper << 48;          // Value contains 0xFFFF000000000000Di2015NewLine        valueUpper += (uint)Mask.Upper;         // Value contains 0xFFFF000000000001Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Lower:Di2015NewLine        ulong valueLower = address16;           // Value contains 0x000000000000FFFFDi2015NewLine        valueLower = valueLower << 32;          // Value contains 0x0000FFFF00000000Di2015NewLine        // No need to set a 0-bit, it is already 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // DWord:Di2015NewLine        ulong valueDword = address32;           // Value contains 0x00000000FFFFFFFFDi2015NewLine        valueDword = valueDword << 32;          // Value contains 0xFFFFFFFF00000000Di2015NewLine        valueDword += (uint)Mask.DoubleWord;    // Value contains 0xFFFFFFFF00000010Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ulong addr1 = ParseAddress((long)valueUpper);Di2015NewLine        ulong addr2 = ParseAddress((long)valueLower);Di2015NewLine        ulong addr3 = ParseAddress((long)valueDword);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ulong ParseAddress(long address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Casting to ulong, as negative values don't make sense in addresses or bitwise operations.Di2015NewLine        ulong value = (ulong)address;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Take the mask from the least significant bitsDi2015NewLine        Mask mask = (Mask)(value & uint.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Shift the mask bytes "off" the addr, get the remaining address. Di2015NewLine        ulong addr = ((ulong)value >> 32);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is the doubleword bit set?Di2015NewLine        if ((mask & Mask.DoubleWord) == Mask.DoubleWord)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return addr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((mask & Mask.Upper) == Mask.Upper)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (addr >> 16);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return addr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine    public enum Mask : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Upper = 1,Di2015NewLine        DoubleWord = 2,Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9853767Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PrestoObservableCollection<T> : ObservableCollection<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private bool _delayOnCollectionChangedNotification { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Add a range of IEnumerable items to the observable collection and optionally delay notification until the operation is complete.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="itemsToAdd"></param>Di2015NewLine        public void AddRange(IEnumerable<T> itemsToAdd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (itemsToAdd == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("itemsToAdd");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (itemsToAdd.Any() == false) { return; }  // Nothing to add.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _delayOnCollectionChangedNotification = true;            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (T item in itemsToAdd) { this.Add(item); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ResetNotificationAndFireChangedEvent();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Clear the items in the ObservableCollection and optionally delay notification until the operation is complete.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void ClearItemsAndNotifyChangeOnlyWhenDone()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.Any()) { return; }  // Nothing available to remove.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _delayOnCollectionChangedNotification = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ResetNotificationAndFireChangedEvent();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Override the virtual OnCollectionChanged() method on the ObservableCollection class.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">Event arguments</param>Di2015NewLine        protected override void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_delayOnCollectionChangedNotification) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            base.OnCollectionChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ResetNotificationAndFireChangedEvent()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Turn delay notification off and call the OnCollectionChanged() method and tell it we had a change in the collection.Di2015NewLine            _delayOnCollectionChangedNotification = false;Di2015NewLine            this.OnCollectionChanged(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9854578Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Book FindLastBookPublishedBefore(List<Book> books,Di2015NewLine                                               DateTime date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine int min = 0, max = books.Count;Di2015NewLine Book candidate = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine while (min < max)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  int mid = (min + max) / 2;Di2015NewLine  Book book = books[mid];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (book.Publish_date > date)Di2015NewLine   max = mid - 1;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   candidate = book;Di2015NewLine   ++min;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (min >= max)Di2015NewLine   break;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return candidate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9858048Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DownloadFile(string url, string file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] result;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebRequest wr = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        wr.ContentType = "application/x-bittorrent";Di2015NewLine        using (WebResponse response = wr.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool gzip = response.Headers["Content-Encoding"] == "gzip";Di2015NewLine            var responseStream = gzipDi2015NewLine                                    ? new GZipStream(response.GetResponseStream(), CompressionMode.Decompress)Di2015NewLine                                    : response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int count = 0;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    count = responseStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                    memoryStream.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                } while (count != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(new FileStream(file, FileMode.Create)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9858523Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar inputs = new[] Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    "Jeremy is trying #20 times to [understand this]",Di2015NewLine    "#20 Jeremy is trying [understand this] times to"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLinestring pattern = @"(?<Number>#\\d+\\b)|(?<Subtitle>\\[.+?])|\\s*(?<Text>(?:.(?!#\\d+\\b|\\[.*?]))+)\\s*";Di2015NewLineforeach (var input in inputs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Input: " + input);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match m in Regex.Matches(input, pattern))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // skip first group, which is the entire matched textDi2015NewLine        var group = m.Groups.Cast<Group>().Skip(1).First(g => g.Success);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(group.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9858523Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar re = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLineforeach (var input in inputs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Input: " + input);Di2015NewLine    var query = from Match m in re.Matches(input)Di2015NewLine                from g in re.GetGroupNames().Skip(1)Di2015NewLine                where m.Groups[g].SuccessDi2015NewLine                select newDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    GroupName = g,Di2015NewLine                    Value = m.Groups[g].ValueDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", item.GroupName, item.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9858658Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void ReplaceColor(Bitmap bitmap, Color originalColor, Color replacementColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var y = 0; y < bitmap.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (var x = 0; x < bitmap.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bitmap.GetPixel(x, y) == originalColor)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bitmap.SetPixel(x, y, replacementColor);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private unsafe void ReplaceColorUnsafe(Bitmap bitmap, byte[] originalColor, byte[] replacementColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (originalColor.Length != replacementColor.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Original and Replacement arguments are in different pixel formats.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (originalColor.SequenceEqual(replacementColor))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var data = bitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(Point.Empty, bitmap.Size),Di2015NewLine                                   ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine                                   bitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var bpp = Image.GetPixelFormatSize(data.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (originalColor.Length != bpp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Original and Replacement arguments and the bitmap are in different pixel format.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var start = (byte*)data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        var end = start + data.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var px = start; px < end; px += bpp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var match = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var bit = 0; bit < bpp; bit++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (px[bit] != originalColor[bit])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    match = false;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!match)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var bit = 0; bit < bpp; bit++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                px[bit] = replacementColor[bit];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bitmap.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9858658Di2015UniqueSeparator        this.ReplaceColor(myBitmap, Color.White, Color.Yellow); // SLOWDi2015NewLine
9858658Di2015UniqueSeparator        var orgRGB = new byte[] { 255, 255, 255 }; // White (in RGB format)Di2015NewLine        var repRGB = new byte[] { 255, 255, 0 }; // Yellow (in RGB format)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var orgARGB = new byte[] { 255, 255, 255, 255 }; // White (in ARGB format)Di2015NewLine        var repARGB = new byte[] { 255, 255, 255, 0 }; // Yellow (in ARGB format)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var orgRGBA = new byte[] { 255, 255, 255, 255 }; // White (in RGBA format)Di2015NewLine        var repRGBA = new byte[] { 255, 255, 0, 255 }; // Yellow (in RGBA format)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var orgBytes = orgRGB; // or ARGB or RGBA, depending on bitmap's pixel formatDi2015NewLine        var repBytes = repRGB; // or ARGB or RGBA, depending on bitmap's pixel formatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.ReplaceColorUnsafe(myBitmap, orgBytes, repBytes); // FASTDi2015NewLine

9858736Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ParalellizeArrayFill(int threadCount, float[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (array == null || array.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Array cannot be empty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (threadCount <= 1)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Thread count should be bigger than 1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int itemsPerThread = array.Length / threadCount;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < threadCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread( (state) => FillArray(array, i*itemsPerThread, itemsPerThread));Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void FillArray(float[] array, int startIndex, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = startIndex; i < startIndex + count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // init valueDi2015NewLine        array[i] = value; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9860455Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TreeNode : IEnumerable<TreeNode>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, TreeNode> _childs = new Dictionary<string, TreeNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public readonly string ID;Di2015NewLine    public TreeNode Parent { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode(string id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ID = id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode GetChild(string id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this._childs[id];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(TreeNode item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (item.Parent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item.Parent._childs.Remove(item.ID);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        item.Parent = this;Di2015NewLine        this._childs.Add(item.ID, item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<TreeNode> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this._childs.Values.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this._childs.Count; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9860455Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar tree = new TreeNode("Root")Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   new TreeNode("Category 1")Di2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 1"),Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 2"),Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 3"),Di2015NewLine                       },Di2015NewLine                   new TreeNode("Category 2")Di2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 1"),Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 2"),Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 3"),Di2015NewLine                           new TreeNode("Item 4"),Di2015NewLine                       }Di2015NewLine               };Di2015NewLine
9860455Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TreeNode BuildTree(string tree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lines = tree.Split(new[] { Environment.NewLine }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new TreeNode("TreeRoot");Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<TreeNode> { result };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var line in lines)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var trimmedLine = line.Trim();Di2015NewLine        var indent = line.Length - trimmedLine.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var child = new TreeNode(trimmedLine);Di2015NewLine        list[indent].Add(child);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (indent + 1 < list.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list[indent + 1] = child;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string BuildString(TreeNode tree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BuildString(sb, tree, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void BuildString(StringBuilder sb, TreeNode node, int depth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(node.ID.PadLeft(node.ID.Length + depth));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var child in node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BuildString(sb, child, depth + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9860817Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Dictionary for holding the controls design time Click EventHandlers.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate Dictionary<Control, EventHandler> _interceptedClickEventHandlers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Recursively moves through the child controls assigning events for scrolling and replacing Click events Di2015NewLine/// with an interception EventHandler that prevents the Click event occuring if the Panel was scrolled.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="control">The control to handle the events for and whose children to recurse through.</param>Di2015NewLineprivate void RecursivelySubscribeChildEvents(Control control)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!(control is IPanelItem))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Subscribe the events for the scroll handlingDi2015NewLine    control.MouseDown += new MouseEventHandler(UIPanel_MouseDown);Di2015NewLine    control.MouseMove += new MouseEventHandler(UIPanel_MouseMove);Di2015NewLine    control.MouseUp += new MouseEventHandler(UIPanel_MouseUp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Intercept the click eventDi2015NewLine    FieldInfo eventClickField = typeof(Control).GetField("Click", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    if (eventClickField != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_interceptedClickEventHandlers == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _interceptedClickEventHandlers = new Dictionary<Control, EventHandler>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the original event and store it against the control for actioning laterDi2015NewLine        EventHandler eventClick = (EventHandler)eventClickField.GetValue(control);Di2015NewLine        _interceptedClickEventHandlers.Add(control, eventClick);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unsubscribe the old event and assign the interception eventDi2015NewLine        control.Click -= (EventHandler)eventClick;Di2015NewLine        control.Click += new EventHandler(UIPanel_ChildClick);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Recurse the event subscription operationDi2015NewLine    foreach (Control child in control.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RecursivelySubscribeChildEvents(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void UIPanel_ChildClick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    EventHandler interceptedHandler = _interceptedClickEventHandlers[(Control)sender];Di2015NewLine    if (interceptedHandler != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Fire the originally subscribed event if the panel is not scrollingDi2015NewLine        if (!_isScrolling)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            interceptedHandler(sender, e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9870815Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void convertFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // build name of output fileDi2015NewLine    string convertedFile = Path.ChangeExtension(filename, ".out");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open input file for readingDi2015NewLine    FileInfo source = new FileInfo(filename);Di2015NewLine    StreamReader srcStream = source.OpenText();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open output file for writingDi2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter dstStream = File.CreateText(convertedFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // loop over input fileDi2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get next line from input fileDi2015NewLine            line = srcStream.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!Regex.IsMatch(line, @"fred=\\d+"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dstStream.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine                dstStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (line != null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("File written to: {0}", convertedFile));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9871232Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void addTreeNode(XmlNode xmlNode, TreeNode treeNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNode xNode;Di2015NewLine        TreeNode tNode;Di2015NewLine        XmlNodeList xNodeList;Di2015NewLine        if (xmlNode.HasChildNodes && xmlNode.Name != "title") //The current node has childrenDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xNodeList = xmlNode.ChildNodes;Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x <= xNodeList.Count - 1; x++)Di2015NewLine            //Loop through the child nodesDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                xNode = xmlNode.ChildNodes[x];Di2015NewLine                //treeNode.Nodes.Add(new TreeNode(xNode.Name));Di2015NewLine                //tNode = treeNode.Nodes[x];Di2015NewLine                addTreeNode(xNode, treeNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (xmlNode.Name == "title") //No children, so add the outer xml (trimming off whitespace)Di2015NewLine            treeNode.Nodes.Add(new TreeNode(xmlNode.InnerText));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9871232Di2015UniqueSeparatorOpenFileDialog dlg = new OpenFileDialog();Di2015NewLine    dlg.Title = "Open XML document";Di2015NewLine    dlg.Filter = "XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml";Di2015NewLine    dlg.FileName = Application.StartupPath + "\\\\..\\\\..\\\\Sample.xml";Di2015NewLine    if (dlg.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Just a good practice -- change the cursor to a Di2015NewLine            //wait cursor while the nodes populateDi2015NewLine            this.Cursor = Cursors.WaitCursor;Di2015NewLine            //First, we'll load the Xml documentDi2015NewLine            XmlDocument xDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            xDoc.Load(dlg.FileName);Di2015NewLine            //Now, clear out the treeview, Di2015NewLine            //and add the first (root) nodeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            treeView1.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLine            TreeNode rootTreeNode = new TreeNode(xDoc.DocumentElement.Name);Di2015NewLine            treeView1.Nodes.Add(rootTreeNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (XmlNode titleNode in xDoc.DocumentElement.SelectNodes(@"//title"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rootTreeNode.Nodes.Add(titleNode.InnerText);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            treeView1.ExpandAll();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (XmlException xExc)Di2015NewLine        //Exception is thrown is there is an error in the XmlDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(xExc.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) //General exceptionDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Cursor = Cursors.Default; //Change the cursor backDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }}Di2015NewLine

9874031Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TResult ExecuteRequest<TChannel, TResult>(Di2015NewLine                                                           this ChannelFactory<TChannel> factory,Di2015NewLine                                                           Func<TChannel, TResult> readDelegate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (factory == null || readDelegate == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(TResult);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TChannel channel = factory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine        // Changes the timeout to 10 minutes so you can step through serverDi2015NewLine        // code if you need to without getting a timeout error.Di2015NewLine        ((IClientChannel)channel).OperationTimeout = TimeSpan.FromMinutes(10);Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        TResult result;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = readDelegate(channel);Di2015NewLine            var client = (IClientChannel)channel;Di2015NewLine            CommunicationState state = client.State;Di2015NewLine            if (state != CommunicationState.Faulted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                client.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                client.Abort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((IClientChannel)channel).Abort();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((IClientChannel)channel).DisposeSafe();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9875579Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void main(String... args) {Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = { 1, -128, -1 }; // check sum is -128 or 0x80 or 128 (unsigned)Di2015NewLine    System.out.println("makeCS "+ makeCS(bytes));Di2015NewLine    System.out.println("makeCS2 "+ makeCS2(bytes));Di2015NewLine    System.out.println("makeCS3 "+ makeCS3(bytes));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int makeCS(byte... arr) {Di2015NewLine    byte cs = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (byte b : arr)Di2015NewLine        cs += b;Di2015NewLine    return cs & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int makeCS2(byte[] arr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int cs = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int add = arr[i];Di2015NewLine        cs += (0xFF & add);Di2015NewLine        cs &= 0xFF;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return cs;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static short makeCS3(byte[] arr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    short cs = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cs += arr[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return cs;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9877164Di2015UniqueSeparator//Box your object state with the current thread contextDi2015NewLineobject[] boxedItems = new []{request, SynchronizationContext.Current};Di2015NewLinerequest.BeginGetResponse(new AsyncCallback(GetLoginResponseCallback), Di2015NewLine    boxedItems);Di2015NewLine
9877164Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void GetLoginResponseCallback(IAsyncResult asynchronousResult)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine//MY UPDATE Di2015NewLine    //Unbox your object state with the current thread contextDi2015NewLine    object[] boxedItems = asynchronousResult.AsyncState as object[];Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = boxedItems[0] as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine    SynchronizationContext context = boxedItems[1] as SynchronizationContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // End the operationDi2015NewLine    using(HttpWebResponse response =  Di2015NewLine        (HttpWebResponse)request.EndGetResponse(asynchronousResult))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(Stream streamResponse = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using(StreamReader streamRead = new StreamReader(streamResponse))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string responseString = streamRead.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(responseString);Di2015NewLine//MY UPDATEDi2015NewLine                //Make an asynchronous call back onto the main UI thread Di2015NewLine                //(context.Send for a synchronous call)Di2015NewLine                //Pass responseString as your method parameter Di2015NewLine                //If you have more than one object, you will have to box againDi2015NewLine                context.Post(UIMethodToCall, responseString);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9878585Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class LocalizationStringInjection<TSource, TTarget> : LoopValueInjectionBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ILocalizationContext LocalizationContext { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected LocalizationStringInjection(ILocalizationContext localizationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LocalizationContext = localizationContext;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual bool TypesMatch(Type sourceType, Type targetType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sourceType == typeof(TSource) && targetType == typeof(TTarget);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Inject(object source, object target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyDescriptor targetPropertyDescriptor in target.GetProps())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var t1 = targetPropertyDescriptor;Di2015NewLine            var es = UberFlatter.Flat(targetPropertyDescriptor.Name, source, type => TypesMatch(type, t1.PropertyType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var endpoint = es.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            if (endpoint == null) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sourceValue = endpoint.Property.GetValue(endpoint.Component) is TSource ? (TSource)endpoint.Property.GetValue(endpoint.Component) : default(TSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (AllowSetValue(sourceValue))Di2015NewLine                targetPropertyDescriptor.SetValue(target, SetValue(sourceValue, targetPropertyDescriptor));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract TTarget SetValue(TSource sourcePropertyValue, PropertyDescriptor targetPropertyDescriptor);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LengthLocalizationStringInjection : LocalizationStringInjection<decimal, string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public LengthLocalizationStringInjection(ILocalizationContext localizationContext) : base(localizationContext) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override string SetValue(decimal sourceValue, PropertyDescriptor targetPropertyDescriptor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lengthHints = targetPropertyDescriptor.Attributes.Cast<object>().Where(attribute => attribute.GetType() == typeof(LengthLocalizationAttribute)).Cast<LengthLocalizationAttribute>().ToList();Di2015NewLine        return lengthHints.Any() ? sourceValue.ToLength(lengthHints.First(l => l.SuggestedLengthType == LocalizationContext.Length).SuggestedLengthType) : sourceValue.ToLength(default(LengthType));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9878852Di2015UniqueSeparator.Compile
9878852Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EventContainerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<MyEventArgs> MyEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Fire()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Firing");Di2015NewLine        if (MyEvent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyEvent(this, new MyEventArgs());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Fired");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EventContainer container = new EventContainer();Di2015NewLine        var adder = container.GetType().GetMethod("add_MyEvent");Di2015NewLine        var remover = container.GetType().GetMethod("remove_MyEvent");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object self = null;Di2015NewLine        Func<object> getSelf = () => self;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var block = Expression.Block(Di2015NewLine            // Call something to output to console.Di2015NewLine            Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                typeof(Console).GetMethod("WriteLine", new Type[] { typeof(string) }),Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant("Event called")),Di2015NewLine            // Now call the remove_Event method.Di2015NewLine            Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(container), // passing the container as "this"Di2015NewLine                remover, // And the remover as the method infoDi2015NewLine                Expression.Convert( // we need to cast the result of getSelf to the correct type to pass as an argumentDi2015NewLine                    Expression.Invoke( // For the parameter (what to convert), we need to call getSelfDi2015NewLine                        Expression.Constant(getSelf)), // So this is a ref to getSelfDi2015NewLine                    adder.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType) // finally, say what to convert to.Di2015NewLine               ) Di2015NewLine           );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a lambda of the correct type.Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine            adder.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType, Di2015NewLine            block, Di2015NewLine            Expression.Parameter(typeof(object)), Di2015NewLine            Expression.Parameter(typeof(MyEventArgs)));Di2015NewLine        var del = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Make sure "self" knows what the delegate is (so our generated code can remove it)Di2015NewLine        self = del;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the event.Di2015NewLine        adder.Invoke(container, new object[] { del });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fire once - see that delegate is being called.Di2015NewLine        container.Fire();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fire twice - see that the delegate was removed.Di2015NewLine        container.Fire();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9879771Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ImageHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static ImageFormat[] supportedFormats = new ImageFormat[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Bmp,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Gif,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Jpeg,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Png,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Tiff,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Wmf,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.Emf,Di2015NewLine        ImageFormat.ExifDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int GetImageOrder(this Image target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < supportedFormats.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (target.RawFormat.Equals(supportedFormats[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the image format is not within our supported formats array:Di2015NewLine        // just order it to the very endDi2015NewLine        return 9999;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9880687Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring result = "";Di2015NewLinebool minus = false;Di2015NewLineif (value == 0 ) {Di2015NewLine    result = "0";Di2015NewLine} else {Di2015NewLine    // Begin the string with a minus (`-`) if value is negativeDi2015NewLine    // and continue the conversion with a positive value.Di2015NewLine    if (value < 0) {Di2015NewLine         minus = true;Di2015NewLine         value = - value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add decimals to the result as long as the remaining number is not zero.Di2015NewLine    while (value > 0) { Di2015NewLine        // Get last decimal using the modulo operatorDi2015NewLine        int lastDecimal = value % 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Prepend the decimal to the result after having converted it to a characterDi2015NewLine        result = (char)('0' + lastDecimal) + result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Divide the value by 10. Integer division!Di2015NewLine        value = value / 10;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (minus) {Di2015NewLine        result = "-" + result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9884562Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DispatcherGroupDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Action> _delegates;Di2015NewLine    private List<object[]> _parameters;Di2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent _isFinished;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Action toInvoke, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _delegates.Add(toInvoke);Di2015NewLine        _parameters.Add(parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Invoke(Dispatcher dispatcher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<DispatcherOperation> operations = new List<>();Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < _delegates.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DispatcherOperation operation = dispatcher.BeginInvoke(_delegates[i], _parameters[i]);Di2015NewLine            operations.Add(operation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check status of all operations before completionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DispatcherGroupInvokerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Queue<DispatcherGroup> _groups;Di2015NewLine    public Dispatcher Dispatcher { get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public void Invoke()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!_groups.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DispatcherGroup group = _groups.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            group.Invoke(Dispatcher);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9884712Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate table #tempDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine  resNo int,Di2015NewLine  subres int,Di2015NewLine  enddate datetime,Di2015NewLine  primary key (resNo, subres)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Store the values you need for enddate in a temp tableDi2015NewLineinsert into #tempDi2015NewLineselect resNo, Di2015NewLine       subres,Di2015NewLine       max(enddate) as enddateDi2015NewLinefrom t_resourcetableDi2015NewLinegroup by resNo, subresDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Delete duplicates keeping the row with min startdateDi2015NewLinedelete TDi2015NewLinefrom (Di2015NewLine        select row_number() over(partition by resNo, subres order by startdate) as rnDi2015NewLine        from t_resourcetableDi2015NewLine     ) as TDi2015NewLinewhere rn > 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Set enddate where neededDi2015NewLineupdate T set enddate = tmp.enddateDi2015NewLinefrom t_resourcetable as TDi2015NewLine  inner join #temp as tmpDi2015NewLine    on T.resNo = tmp.resNo andDi2015NewLine       t.subres = tmp.subresDi2015NewLinewhere T.enddate <> tmp.enddateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedrop table #tempDi2015NewLine

9885498Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string CreateSPFile(string spServerURL, string spDocumenttargetUrl, string folder, string fileName, Stream fileStream, bool overwrite)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // I suggest skip this pre check since it internally opens a new site objectDi2015NewLine    // If you have to silenlty ignore non-existant SPSite you should catch a FileNotFoundException.Di2015NewLine    if (SPSite.Exists(new Uri(spServerURL)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use the using construct to safely dispose the opened SPSite objectDi2015NewLine        using (SPSite site = new SPSite(spServerURL))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // SPWeb object opened with SPSite.OpenWeb() have to be disposed as wellDi2015NewLine            using (SPWeb web = site.OpenWeb())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                web.AllowUnsafeUpdates = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string targetUrl = SPUrlUtility.CombineUrl(web.ServerRelativeUrl, spDocumenttargetUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(folder))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    targetUrl = SPUrlUtility.CombineUrl(targetUrl, folder);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SPFolder target = web.GetFolder(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SPFileCollection files = target.Files;Di2015NewLine                target.Files.Add(fileName, fileStream, overwrite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // no need to revert AllowUnsafeUpdates for newly opened websDi2015NewLine                // web.AllowUnsafeUpdates = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9885706Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string UseHttpWebApproach<T>(string serviceUrl, string resourceUrl, string method, T requestBody)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string responseMessage = null;Di2015NewLine            var request = WebRequest.Create(string.Concat(serviceUrl, resourceUrl)) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine            if (request != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                request.ContentType = "application/xml";Di2015NewLine                request.Method = method;Di2015NewLine            }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(method == "POST" && requestBody != null)Di2015NewLine            {                    Di2015NewLine                byte[] requestBodyBytes = ToByteArrayUsingJsonContractSer(requestBody);                Di2015NewLine                request.ContentLength = requestBodyBytes.Length;Di2015NewLine                using (Stream postStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine                    postStream.Write(requestBodyBytes, 0, requestBodyBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (request != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine                if(response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Stream responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine                    if (responseStream != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        responseMessage = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    responseMessage = response.StatusDescription;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return responseMessage;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9890060Di2015UniqueSeparatortry {Di2015NewLine            String URL;Di2015NewLine            URL = "http://localhost/MyRESTSvc/DownloadStreamItem";       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpClient httpclient = new DefaultHttpClient();Di2015NewLine            HttpPost httppost = new HttpPost(URL);Di2015NewLine            InputStream inputStream = getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.task);Di2015NewLine            // Here task is any raw file you want to keep as input.. you may ignore it.Di2015NewLine            InputStreamEntity reqEntity = new InputStreamEntity(inputStream, -1);Di2015NewLine            reqEntity.setContentType("binary/octet-stream");Di2015NewLine            reqEntity.setChunked(true); // Send in multiple parts if neededDi2015NewLine            httppost.setEntity(reqEntity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpResponse response = httpclient.execute(httppost);  Di2015NewLine            displayAlert("Success !!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ClientProtocolException e) {                Di2015NewLine            displayAlert(e.getMessage());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException e) {                Di2015NewLine            displayAlert(e.getMessage());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) {                Di2015NewLine            displayAlert(e.getMessage());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9890064Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       if (!IsPostback){Di2015NewLine        string buildingTypeSoldier = "soldier";Di2015NewLine        var soldierBuilding = from b in dc.BuildingsDi2015NewLine                                 where b.buildingtype == buildingTypeSoldierDi2015NewLine                                 select b.buildingname;Di2015NewLine        ddlSoldierBuildings.DataSource =soldierBuilding;Di2015NewLine        ddlSoldierBuildings.DataBind();Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9890068Di2015UniqueSeparatorMemoryStream.GetBuffer()
9890164Di2015UniqueSeparator    static int SimpleBoyerMooreSearch(byte[] haystack, byte[] needle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] lookup = new int[256];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < lookup.Length; i++) { lookup[i] = needle.Length; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < needle.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lookup[needle[i]] = needle.Length - i - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int index = needle.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        var lastByte = needle.Last();Di2015NewLine        while (index < haystack.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var checkByte = haystack[index];Di2015NewLine            if (haystack[index] == lastByte)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool found = true;Di2015NewLine                for (int j = needle.Length - 2; j >= 0; j--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (haystack[index - needle.Length + j + 1] != needle[j])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        found = false;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (found)Di2015NewLine                    return index - needle.Length + 1;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    index++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                index += lookup[checkByte];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9890310Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ReportPage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.Init += (o, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if the local time is not saved yet in Session and the request has not posted the localTimeDi2015NewLine        if (Session["localTime"] == null && String.IsNullOrEmpty(Request.Params["localTime"]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // then clear the content and write some html, a javascript code which submits the local timeDi2015NewLine            Response.ClearContent();Di2015NewLine            Response.Write(@"<form id='local' method='post' name='local'>Di2015NewLine                                <input type='hidden' id='localTime' name='localTime' />Di2015NewLine                                <script type='text/javascript'>Di2015NewLine                                    document.getElementById('localTime').value = new Date();Di2015NewLine                                    document.getElementById('local').submit();Di2015NewLine                                </script>Di2015NewLine                            </form>");Di2015NewLine            // Di2015NewLine            Response.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // end the response so PageLoad, PagePreRender etc won't be executedDi2015NewLine            Response.End();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if the request contains the localtime, then save it in SessionDi2015NewLine            if (Request.Params["localTime"] != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Session["localTime"] = Request.Params["localTime"];Di2015NewLine                // and redirect back to the original urlDi2015NewLine                Response.Redirect(Request.RawUrl);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9891827Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Thumbnail(Stream source, Stream destination, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int width = 0, height = 0;Di2015NewLine    BitmapFrame frame = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        frame = BitmapDecoder.Create(source, BitmapCreateOptions.None, BitmapCacheOption.None).Frames[0];Di2015NewLine        width = frame.PixelWidth;Di2015NewLine        height = frame.PixelHeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new MyException("The image file is not in any of the supported image formats.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (width > AbsoluteLargestUploadWidth || height > AbsoluteLargestUploadHeight)Di2015NewLine        throw new MyException("This image is too large");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int targetWidth, targetHeight;Di2015NewLine        ResizeWithAspect(width, height, maxWidth, maxHeight, out targetWidth, out targetHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapFrame targetFrame;Di2015NewLine        if (frame.PixelWidth == targetWidth && frame.PixelHeight == targetHeight)Di2015NewLine            targetFrame = frame;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var group = new DrawingGroup();Di2015NewLine            RenderOptions.SetBitmapScalingMode(group, BitmapScalingMode.HighQuality);Di2015NewLine            group.Children.Add(new ImageDrawing(frame, new Rect(0, 0, targetWidth, targetHeight)));Di2015NewLine            var targetVisual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine            var targetContext = targetVisual.RenderOpen();Di2015NewLine            targetContext.DrawDrawing(group);Di2015NewLine            var target = new RenderTargetBitmap(targetWidth, targetHeight, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Default);Di2015NewLine            targetContext.Close();Di2015NewLine            target.Render(targetVisual);Di2015NewLine            targetFrame = BitmapFrame.Create(target);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var enc = new JpegBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine        enc.Frames.Add(targetFrame);Di2015NewLine        enc.QualityLevel = 80;Di2015NewLine        enc.Save(destination);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new MyException("The image file appears to be corrupt.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Generic helper to compute width/height that fit into specified maxima while preserving aspect ratio.</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static void ResizeWithAspect(int origWidth, int origHeight, int maxWidth, int maxHeight, out int sizedWidth, out int sizedHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (origWidth < maxWidth && origHeight < maxHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sizedWidth = origWidth;Di2015NewLine        sizedHeight = origHeight;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sizedWidth = maxWidth;Di2015NewLine    sizedHeight = (int) ((double) origHeight / origWidth * sizedWidth + 0.5);Di2015NewLine    if (sizedHeight > maxHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sizedHeight = maxHeight;Di2015NewLine        sizedWidth = (int) ((double) origWidth / origHeight * sizedHeight + 0.5);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9893623Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal FindBestSubsequence (this IEnumerable<decimal> source, out int startIndex, out int endIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal result = decimal.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    decimal sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    int tempStart = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<decimal> tempList = new List<decimal>(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    endIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < tempList.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sum += tempList[index];Di2015NewLine        if (sum > result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = sum;Di2015NewLine            startIndex = tempStart;Di2015NewLine            endIndex = index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (sum < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum = 0;Di2015NewLine            tempStart = index + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9895049Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan elapsed;Di2015NewLine    string result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    elapsed = TheLINQWay(buildString(1000000), out result);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("LINQ way: {0}", elapsed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    elapsed = TheRegExWay(buildString(1000000), out result);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("RegEx way: {0}", elapsed);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan TheRegExWay(string s, out string result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stopw.Start();Di2015NewLine    result = Regex.Replace(s, @"\\P{L}", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    stopw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return stopw.Elapsed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan TheLINQWay(string s, out string result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stopw.Start();Di2015NewLine    result = new string(s.Where(c => char.IsLetter(c)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    stopw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return stopw.Elapsed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring buildString(int len)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[len];Di2015NewLine    Random r = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine        buffer[i] = (byte)r.Next(256);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9895244Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String ReadUntil(this StreamReader sr, String delim)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    bool found = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!found && !sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       for (int i = 0; i < delim.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           Char c = (char)sr.Read();Di2015NewLine           sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if (c != delim[i])Di2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if (i == delim.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               sb.Remove(sb.Length - delim.Length, delim.Length);Di2015NewLine               found = true;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9902060Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StorageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void SaveFilesToIsoStore()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //These files must match what is included in the application package,Di2015NewLine        //or BinaryStream.Dispose below will throw an exception.Di2015NewLine        string[] files = {Di2015NewLine        "images/img1.jpg", "images/img2.png"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IsolatedStorageFile isoStore = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (files.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string f in files)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StreamResourceInfo sr = Application.GetResourceStream(new Uri(f, UriKind.Relative));Di2015NewLine                using (BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(sr.Stream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] data = br.ReadBytes((int)sr.Stream.Length);Di2015NewLine                    SaveToIsoStore(f, data);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SaveToIsoStore(string fileName, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string strBaseDir = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        string delimStr = "/";Di2015NewLine        char[] delimiter = delimStr.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        string[] dirsPath = fileName.Split(delimiter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the IsoStore.Di2015NewLine        IsolatedStorageFile isoStore = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Re-create the directory structure.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dirsPath.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            strBaseDir = System.IO.Path.Combine(strBaseDir, dirsPath[i]);Di2015NewLine            isoStore.CreateDirectory(strBaseDir);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Remove the existing file.Di2015NewLine        if (isoStore.FileExists(fileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isoStore.DeleteFile(fileName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Write the file.Di2015NewLine        using (BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(isoStore.CreateFile(fileName)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(data);Di2015NewLine            bw.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9903941Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class f_results {Di2015NewLine    public String name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime cdate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime mdate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime adate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Int64 size { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // write one to a fileDi2015NewLine    public void WriteTo(BinaryWriter wrtr) {Di2015NewLine        wrtr.Write(name);Di2015NewLine        wrtr.Write(cdate.Ticks);Di2015NewLine        wrtr.Write(mdate.Ticks);Di2015NewLine        wrtr.Write(adate.Ticks);Di2015NewLine        wrtr.Write(size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // read one from a fileDi2015NewLine    public f_results(BinaryReader rdr) {Di2015NewLine        name = rdr.ReadString();Di2015NewLine        cdate = new DateTime(rdr.ReadInt64());Di2015NewLine        mdate = new DateTime(rdr.ReadInt64());Di2015NewLine        adate = new DateTime(rdr.ReadInt64());Di2015NewLine        size = rdr.ReadInt64();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // stream a whole file as an IEnumerable (so very little memory needed)Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<f_results> FromFile(string dataFilePath) {Di2015NewLine        var file = new FileStream(dataFilePath, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine        var rdr = new BinaryReader(file);Di2015NewLine        var eos = rdr.BaseStream.Length;Di2015NewLine        while (rdr.BaseStream.Position < eos) yield return new f_results(rdr);Di2015NewLine        rdr.Close();Di2015NewLine        file.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var d1 = new DirTree(@"C:\\",Di2015NewLine            new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir1",Di2015NewLine                new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir1\\Dir2"),Di2015NewLine                new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir1\\Dir3")Di2015NewLine                ),Di2015NewLine                new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir4",Di2015NewLine                new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir4\\Dir5"),Di2015NewLine                new DirTree(@"C:\\Dir4\\Dir6")Di2015NewLine                ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var path = @"D:\\Dirs.dir";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // write the directory tree to a fileDi2015NewLine        var file = new FileStream(path, FileMode.CreateNew | FileMode.Truncate);Di2015NewLine        var w = new BinaryWriter(file);Di2015NewLine        d1.WriteTo(w);Di2015NewLine        w.Close();Di2015NewLine        file.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // read it from the fileDi2015NewLine        var file2 = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine        var rdr = new BinaryReader(file2);Di2015NewLine        var d2 = new DirTree(rdr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now inspect d2 in debugger to see that it was read back into memoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find files bigger than (roughly) 1GBDi2015NewLine        var BigFiles = from f in f_results.FromFile(@"C:\\SomeFile.dat")Di2015NewLine                       where f.size > 1e9Di2015NewLine                       select f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DirTree {Di2015NewLine    public string Path { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    private string FilesFile { get { return Path.Replace(':', '_').Replace('\\\\', '_') + ".dat"; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<f_results> Files() {Di2015NewLine        return f_results.FromFile(this.FilesFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // you'll want to encapsulate this in real code but I didn't for brevityDi2015NewLine    public DirTree[] _SubDirectories;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DirTree(BinaryReader rdr) {Di2015NewLine        Path = rdr.ReadString();Di2015NewLine        int count = rdr.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine        _SubDirectories = new DirTree[count];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) _SubDirectories[i] = new DirTree(rdr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DirTree( string Path, params DirTree[] subDirs){Di2015NewLine        this.Path = Path;Di2015NewLine        _SubDirectories = subDirs;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteTo(BinaryWriter w) {Di2015NewLine        w.Write(Path);           Di2015NewLine        w.Write(_SubDirectories.Length);Di2015NewLine        // depth first is the easiest way to do thisDi2015NewLine        foreach (var f in _SubDirectories) f.WriteTo(w);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9904205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async void HandleButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // All of this method will run in the UI thread, which it needsDi2015NewLine    // to as it touches the UI... however, it won't block when it doesDi2015NewLine    // the web operation.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string url = urlTextBox.Text;Di2015NewLine    WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine    string webText = await client.DownloadStringTaskAsync(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Continuation... automatically called in the UI thread, with appropriateDi2015NewLine    // context (local variables etc) which we used earlier.Di2015NewLine    sizeTextBox.Text = string.Format("{0}: {1}", url, webText.Length); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9904206Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooLocker Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    ReaderWriterLockSlim locker = new ReaderWriterLockSlim(); Di2015NewLine    List<Foo> fooList = new List<Foo>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ChangeFoo(int index, string bar) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        locker.EnterWriteLock(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Foo foo = UnsafeGetFoo(index); Di2015NewLine            foo.Bar = bar; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        finally Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            locker.ExitWriteLock(); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Foo GetFoo(int index)  Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        locker.EnterReadLock(); //throws System.Threading.LockRecursionException Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine        return  UnsafeGetFoo(index);Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        finally Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            locker.ExitReadLock(); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Foo UnsafeGetFoo(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return fooList[index]; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

9905945Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Test for Log4NetDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static void TestLog4Net()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Configures log4netDi2015NewLine    ConfigureLog4net();Di2015NewLine    ILog log = LogManager.GetLogger("foo");Di2015NewLine    log.Debug("This should not appear in a logfile!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ILog log2 = LogManager.GetLogger("NHibernate.SQL");Di2015NewLine    log2.Debug("This should only appear in the NH logfile!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ILog log3 = LogManager.GetLogger("MyProgram");Di2015NewLine    log3.Debug("This should appear in the main program logfile!");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Configures log4netDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static void ConfigureLog4net()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Hierarchy hierarchy = (Hierarchy)LogManager.GetRepository();Di2015NewLine    // Remove any other appendersDi2015NewLine    hierarchy.Root.RemoveAllAppenders();Di2015NewLine    // define some basic settings for the rootDi2015NewLine    Logger rootLogger = hierarchy.Root;Di2015NewLine    rootLogger.Level = Level.Debug;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // declare a RollingFileAppender with 5MB per file and max. 10 filesDi2015NewLine    RollingFileAppender appenderNH = new RollingFileAppender();Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.Name = "RollingLogFileAppenderNHibernate";Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.AppendToFile = true;Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.MaximumFileSize = "5MB";Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.MaxSizeRollBackups = 10;Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.RollingStyle = RollingFileAppender.RollingMode.Size;Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.StaticLogFileName = true;Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.LockingModel = new FileAppender.MinimalLock();Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.File = "log-nhibernate.log";Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.Layout = new PatternLayout("%date - %message%newline");Di2015NewLine    // this activates the FileAppender (without it, nothing would be written)Di2015NewLine    appenderNH.ActivateOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is required, so that we can access the Logger by using Di2015NewLine    // LogManager.GetLogger("NHibernate.SQL") and it can used by NHibernateDi2015NewLine    Logger loggerNH = hierarchy.GetLogger("NHibernate.SQL") as Logger;Di2015NewLine    loggerNH.Level = Level.Debug;Di2015NewLine    loggerNH.AddAppender(appenderNH);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // declare RollingFileAppender with 5MB per file and max. 10 filesDi2015NewLine    RollingFileAppender appenderMain = new RollingFileAppender();Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.Name = "RollingLogFileAppenderMyProgram";Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.AppendToFile = true;Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.MaximumFileSize = "5MB";Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.MaxSizeRollBackups = 10;Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.RollingStyle = RollingFileAppender.RollingMode.Size;Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.StaticLogFileName = true;Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.LockingModel = new FileAppender.MinimalLock();Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.File = "log-MyProgram.log";Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.Layout = new PatternLayout(Di2015NewLine        "%date [%thread] %-5level %logger [%ndc] - %message%newline");Di2015NewLine    // this activates the FileAppender (without it, nothing would be written)Di2015NewLine    appenderMain.ActivateOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is required, so that we can access the Logger by using Di2015NewLine    // LogManager.GetLogger("MyProgram") Di2015NewLine    Logger logger = hierarchy.GetLogger("MyProgram") as Logger;Di2015NewLine    logger.Level = Level.Debug;Di2015NewLine    logger.AddAppender(appenderMain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is required to tell log4net that we're done Di2015NewLine    // with the configuration, so the logging can startDi2015NewLine    hierarchy.Configured = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
