9910401Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> MyList = new List<string> { "second", "first", "second2", "wherever", "third", "second2", "third", "second", "first" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RuleBasedComparer<string> RuleComparer = new RuleBasedComparer<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I want to ensure all instances of "first" appear in the list before all instances of "second" and "second2"Di2015NewLine        // and all instances of "second" and "second2" appear in the list before all instances of "third".Di2015NewLine        // I don't care where "wherever" appears (or anything beyond the above rules)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RuleComparer.AddRule("first", "second");Di2015NewLine        RuleComparer.AddRule("first", "second2");Di2015NewLine        RuleComparer.AddRule("second", "third");Di2015NewLine        RuleComparer.AddRule("second2", "third");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MyList.Sort(RuleComparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in MyList)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RuleBasedComparer<T> : Comparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class OrderRuleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public readonly T Before;Di2015NewLine        public readonly T After;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public OrderRule(T before, T after)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Before = before;Di2015NewLine            After = after;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<OrderRule> _Rules = new List<OrderRule>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<T> DesiredOrdering = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _NeedToCalculateOrdering = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddRule(T before, T after)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_NeedToCalculateOrdering)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Cannot add rules once this comparer has.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _Rules.Add(new OrderRule(before, after));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CalculateOrdering()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _NeedToCalculateOrdering = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ItemsToOrder = _Rules.SelectMany(r => new[] { r.Before, r.After }).Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var ItemToOrder in ItemsToOrder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var MinIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            var MaxIndex = DesiredOrdering.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var Rule in _Rules.Where(r => r.Before.Equals(ItemToOrder)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var indexofAfter = DesiredOrdering.IndexOf(Rule.After);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (indexofAfter != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MaxIndex = Math.Min(MaxIndex, indexofAfter);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var Rule in _Rules.Where(r => r.After.Equals(ItemToOrder)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var indexofBefore = DesiredOrdering.IndexOf(Rule.Before);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (indexofBefore != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MinIndex = Math.Max(MinIndex, indexofBefore + 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (MinIndex > MaxIndex)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Invalid combination of rules found!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DesiredOrdering.Insert(MinIndex, ItemToOrder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_NeedToCalculateOrdering)Di2015NewLine            CalculateOrdering();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (x == null && y != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (x != null && y == null)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine        else if (x == null && y == null)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the applicable rule for this pair (if any)Di2015NewLine        var IndexOfX = DesiredOrdering.IndexOf(x);Di2015NewLine        var IndexOfY = DesiredOrdering.IndexOf(y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IndexOfX != -1 && IndexOfY != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We have a definite orderDi2015NewLine            if (IndexOfX > IndexOfY)Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine            else if (IndexOfX < IndexOfY)Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (IndexOfX != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (IndexOfY != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0; // Or maybe compare x to y directlyDi2015NewLine            //return Comparer<T>.Default.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9911035Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool operator ==(ThreeDPoint a, ThreeDPoint b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If both are null, or both are same instance, return true.Di2015NewLine    if (System.Object.ReferenceEquals(a, b))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If one is null, but not both, return false.Di2015NewLine    if (((object)a == null) || ((object)b == null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return true if the fields match:Di2015NewLine    return a.x == b.x && a.y == b.y && a.z == b.z;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9913265Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class YourDbContext : DbContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void BulkInsert<T>(string tableName, IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var bulkCopy = new SqlBulkCopy(base.Database.Connection))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bulkCopy.BatchSize = list.Count;Di2015NewLine            bulkCopy.DestinationTableName = tableName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            var props = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T))Di2015NewLine                          // Dirty hack to make sure we only have system Di2015NewLine                          // data types (i.e. filter out the Di2015NewLine                          // relationships/collections)Di2015NewLine                          .Cast<PropertyDescriptor>()Di2015NewLine                          .Where(p => "System" == p.PropertyType.Namespace)Di2015NewLine                          .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var prop in props)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bulkCopy.ColumnMappings.Add(prop.Name, prop.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var type = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(prop.PropertyType) Di2015NewLine                           ?? prop.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, type);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var values = new object[props.Length];Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in list)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bulkCopy.WriteToServer(table);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9916444Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ClearArray(Array array, int val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var helper = Enumerable.Repeat(val, Math.Min(array.Length, 1024)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine  var itemSize = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Buffer.BlockCopy(helper, 0, array, 0, helper.Length * itemSize);Di2015NewLine  for (var len = helper.Length; len < array.Length; len *= 2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(array, 0, array, len * itemSize, Math.Min(len, array.Length - len) * itemSize);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic int Count(Array array, Func<int, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var helper = new int[Math.Min(array.Length, 4096)];Di2015NewLine  var itemSize = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var count = 0;Di2015NewLine  for (var offset = 0; offset < array.Length; offset += helper.Length)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var len = Math.Min(helper.Length, array.Length - offset);Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(array, offset * itemSize, helper, 0, len * itemSize);Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < len; ++i)Di2015NewLine      if (predicate(helper[i]))Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine  } Di2015NewLine  return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9918753Di2015UniqueSeparator// mimic the scenario given by the QADi2015NewLinestring[] wordList = new string[] { "hole", "airplane", "lame", "photos", "cart", "mole" };Di2015NewLineint wordLength = 4;Di2015NewLineList<char> requiredCharacters = new List<char>{ 'l', 'e'};Di2015NewLine
9918753Di2015UniqueSeparator// filter all words that dont match the required lengthDi2015NewLinevar candidateWords = wordList.Where(x => x.Length == wordLength);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// define a result set holding all the words and all their matchesDi2015NewLineDictionary<string, List<int>> refinedWordSet = new Dictionary<string, List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (string word in candidateWords)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> matches = new List<int>() { 0 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int currentMatchCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (char character in word)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (requiredCharacters.Contains(character))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentMatchCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if there were previous matchesDi2015NewLine            if (currentMatchCount > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // save the current matchDi2015NewLine                matches.Add(currentMatchCount);Di2015NewLine                currentMatchCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if there was a match at the endDi2015NewLine    if (currentMatchCount > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // save the last matchDi2015NewLine        matches.Add(currentMatchCount);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    refinedWordSet.Add(word, matches);Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// sort by a combination of the total amount of matches as well as the highest matchDi2015NewLinevar goupedRefinedWords = from entry in refinedWordSetDi2015NewLine                            group entry.Key by new { Max = entry.Value.Max(), Total = entry.Value.Sum() } into groupedDi2015NewLine                            select grouped;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var entry in goupedRefinedWords)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Word list with best match: {0} and total match {1}: {2}", Di2015NewLine        entry.Key.Max,Di2015NewLine        entry.Key.Total,Di2015NewLine        entry.Aggregate("", (result, nextWord) => result += nextWord + ", "));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine

9928429Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static ConcurrentStack<Tuple<DateTime, Exception, String, bool, bool>> ErrorStack = new ConcurrentStack<Tuple<DateTime, Exception, String, bool, bool>>();Di2015NewLineprivate static bool ExceptionHandlingTerminated = false;Di2015NewLineprivate static bool ErrorBeingHandled = false; //Only one Error can be processed at a timeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void HandleError(Exception ex, bool showMsgBox) { HandleError(ex, "", showMsgBox, true); }Di2015NewLinepublic static void HandleError(Exception ex, string extraInfo, bool showMsgBox) { HandleError(ex, extraInfo, showMsgBox, true); }Di2015NewLinepublic static void HandleError(Exception ex, string extraInfo = "", bool showMsgBox = true, bool resetApplication = true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if( ExceptionHandlingTerminated || App.Current == null) return;Di2015NewLine    if( ErrorBeingHandled )Di2015NewLine    {   //Queue up this error, it'll be handled later. Don't bother if we've already queued up more than 10 errors, we're just going to be terminating the application in that case anyway.Di2015NewLine        if( ErrorStack.Count < 10 )Di2015NewLine            ErrorStack.Push(new Tuple<DateTime, Exception, String, bool, bool>(DateTime.Now, ex, extraInfo, showMsgBox, resetApplication)); //Thread safe tracking of how many simultaneous errors are being thrownDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ErrorBeingHandled = true;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( Thread.CurrentThread != Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.Thread )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorBeingHandled = false;Di2015NewLine            Invoke_HandleError( ex, extraInfo, showMsgBox, resetApplication );Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( ErrorStack.Count >= 5 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExceptionHandlingTerminated = true;Di2015NewLine            Tuple<DateTime, Exception, String, bool, bool> errParams;Di2015NewLine            String errQueue = String.Concat(DateTime.Now.ToString("hh:mm:ss.ff tt"), ": ", ex.Message, "\\n");Di2015NewLine            while( ErrorStack.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if( ErrorStack.TryPop(out errParams) )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    errQueue += String.Concat(errParams.Item1.ToString("hh:mm:ss.ff tt"), ": ", errParams.Item2.Message, "\\n");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            extraInfo = "Too many simultaneous errors have been thrown in the background:";Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(errQueue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( !((App)App.Current).AppStartupComplete )Di2015NewLine        {   //We can't handle errors the normal way if the app hasn't started yet.Di2015NewLine            extraInfo = "An error occurred before the application could start." + extraInfo;Di2015NewLine            throw ex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( resetApplication )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((MUSUI.App)App.Current).ResetApplication();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( showMsgBox )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //(removed)... Prepare Error messageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //IF the UI is processing a visual tree event (such as IsVisibleChanged), it throws an exception when showing a MessageBox as described here: http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/en-US/wpf/thread/44962927-006e-4629-9aa3-100357861442Di2015NewLine            //The solution is to dispatch and queue the MessageBox. We must use BeginInvoke because dispatcher processing is suspended in such cases.Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action<Exception, String>)delegate(Exception _ex, String _ErrMessage)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show(App.Current.MainWindow, _ErrMessage, "MUS Application Error", MessageBoxButton.OK, MessageBoxImage.Error);Di2015NewLine                ErrorHandled(_ex); //Release the block on the HandleError method and handle any additional queued errors.Di2015NewLine            }, DispatcherPriority.Background, new object[]{ ex, ErrMessage });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorHandled(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch( Exception terminatingError )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ExceptionHandlingTerminated = true;Di2015NewLine        //A very serious error has occurred, such as the application not loading, and we must shut down.Di2015NewLine        Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action<String>)delegate(String _fatalMessage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(_fatalMessage, "Fatal Error", MessageBoxButton.OK, MessageBoxImage.Stop);Di2015NewLine            if( App.Current != null ) App.Current.Shutdown(1);Di2015NewLine        }, DispatcherPriority.Background, new object[] { fatalMessage + "\\n" + terminatingError.Message });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//The set of actions to be performed when error handling is done.Di2015NewLineprivate static void ErrorHandled(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ErrorBeingHandled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If other errors have gotten queued up since this one was being handled, or remain, process the next oneDi2015NewLine    if(ErrorStack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( ExceptionHandlingTerminated || App.Current == null) return;Di2015NewLine        Tuple<DateTime, Exception, String, bool, bool> errParams;Di2015NewLine        //Pop an error off the queue and deal with it:Di2015NewLine        ErrorStack.TryPop(out errParams);Di2015NewLine        HandleError(errParams.Item2, errParams.Item3, errParams.Item4, errParams.Item5);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Dispatches a call to HandleError on the UI thread.Di2015NewLineprivate static void Invoke_HandleError(Exception ex, string extraInfo, bool showMsgBox, bool resetApplication)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ((App)App.Current).Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action<Exception, string, bool, bool>)Di2015NewLine        delegate(Exception _ex, string _extraInfo, bool _showMsgBox, bool _resetApplication)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorHandled(_ex); //Release the semaphore taken by the spawning HandleError callDi2015NewLine            HandleError(_ex, _extraInfo, _showMsgBox, _resetApplication);Di2015NewLine        }, DispatcherPriority.Background, new object[] { ex, extraInfo, showMsgBox, resetApplication });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9930663Di2015UniqueSeparatorConvert.ChangeType
9930663Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Action<T, string>> GetAction<T>(string fieldName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression targetExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "Target");Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression fieldExpr = Expression.Property(targetExpr, fieldName);Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression valueExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(string), "value");Di2015NewLine    MethodCallExpression convertExpr = Expression.Call(typeof(Convert),Di2015NewLine        "ChangeType", null, valueExpr, Expression.Constant(fieldExpr.Type));Di2015NewLine    UnaryExpression valueCast = Expression.Convert(convertExpr, fieldExpr.Type);Di2015NewLine    BinaryExpression assignExpr = Expression.Assign(fieldExpr, valueCast);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Action<T, string>>(assignExpr, targetExpr, valueExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9930764Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the full path of image urlDi2015NewLine    string path = Server.MapPath(Image1.ImageUrl) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // creating image from the image urlDi2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Image i = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // rotate Image 90' DegreeDi2015NewLine    i.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipXY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // save it to its actual pathDi2015NewLine    i.Save(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // release Image FileDi2015NewLine    i.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set Image Control Attribute property to new image(but its old path)Di2015NewLine    Image1.Attributes.Add("ImageUrl", path);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9931356Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void polulateSpecs(int itemID, List<neItem> coll)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Program p = new Program();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < coll.Count - 1; i++) // going over all Objects in the listDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string CatName = coll[i].specCat.Trim(); // define the name of the categoryDi2015NewLine        string queryCategoryCheck = "SELECT ID FROM ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY WHERE ATTRIBUTE_NAME = '" + CatName + "'"; //check if Cat Exist queryDi2015NewLine        string queryCategoryInsert = "INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY(ATTRIBUTE_NAME) VALUES ('" + CatName + "')"; //insert new category queryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int cdId = 0; //Category ID holderDi2015NewLine        string CID = p.querySQLStringReturn(queryCategoryCheck); //get IDDi2015NewLine        int.TryParse(CID, ref cdId); //parse ID to numberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cdId == 0) //if value is 0, then no brand exists, therefore create one:Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.insertSQL(queryCategoryInsert, "Insert New Category " + CatName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now Category should be in the database - get its IDDi2015NewLine        string CID = p.querySQLStringReturn(queryCategoryCheck);Di2015NewLine        int.TryParse(CID, ref cdId); // Category IDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int c = 2; c < coll[i].attributesList.Count; c += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string attname = coll[i].attributesList[c].Trim(); // Name of the attributeDi2015NewLine            string attSpec = coll[i].attributesList[c - 1].Trim(); // Description of the attributeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string queryAttributeCheck = "SELECT ID FROM ATTRIBUTE_LIST WHERE ATT_NAME = '" + attname + "' AND ATT_SPEC = '" + attSpec + "'"; // Query to check if attribute existsDi2015NewLine            string queryAttributeInsert = "INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_LIST(PARENT_CAT, ATT_NAME, ATT_SPEC) VALUES (" + cdId + ", '" + attname + "', '" + attSpec + "')"; // Query to insert new categoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int aId = 0; // Attribute ID holderDi2015NewLine            string AID = p.querySQLStringReturn(queryAttributeCheck); // get IDDi2015NewLine            int.TryParse(AID, ref aId); // parse ID to numberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (aId == 0) // if value is 0, then no bran exist, therefore create oneDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p.insertSQL(queryAttributeInsert, "Insert New Attribute Set " + attname);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // now Category should be in the database - get its IDDi2015NewLine            string AID = p.querySQLStringReturn(queryAttributeCheck);Di2015NewLine            int.TryParse(AID, ref aId); // Attribute IDDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add final record to database (Item ID and Corresponding Attribute category)Di2015NewLine        string queryProductToAttributeCheck = "SELECT ID FROM PRODUCT_TO_ATT_CATEGORY WHERE PROD_ID = '" + itemID + "' AND ATT_CAT = '" + cdId + "'"; // check if Attribute Exist queryDi2015NewLine        string queryProductToAttributeInsert = "INSERT INTO PRODUCT_TO_ATT_CATEGORY(PROD_ID, ATT_CAT) VALUES (" + itemID + ", " + cdId + ")"; // insert new category query                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int ptaID = 0; // Attribute ID holderDi2015NewLine        string PTAID = p.querySQLStringReturn(queryProductToAttributeCheck); // Get IDDi2015NewLine        int.TryParse(PTAID, ref ptaID);Di2015NewLine        p.insertSQL(queryProductToAttributeInsert, "Insert Product to Attribute Mapping " + itemID);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9931869Di2015UniqueSeparator#ifndef _NATIVE_CODE_H_Di2015NewLine#define _NATIVE_CODE_H_Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//NativeCode.hDi2015NewLine//A simple native library which emits only one event.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include <stdlib.h>Di2015NewLine#include <iostream>Di2015NewLineusing namespace std;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#define NATIVELIBRARY_API __declspec(dllexport)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//An argument class to wrap event parametersDi2015NewLineclass NativeEventArgs{Di2015NewLinepublic:Di2015NewLine    //a 32bit integer argumentDi2015NewLine    //any other primitives can be here, just be careful about the byte sizeDi2015NewLine    int argInt32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //null terminated ascii stringDi2015NewLine    const char* argString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //null terminated wide/unicode stringDi2015NewLine    const wchar_t* argWString; Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//A simple mechanism to fire an event from native code.Di2015NewLine//Your library may have a DIFFERENT triggering mechanism (e.g. function pointers)Di2015NewLineclass INativeListenerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic:Di2015NewLine    virtual void OnEvent(const NativeEventArgs& args)=0;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//The actual native library code, source of native eventsDi2015NewLineclass NATIVELIBRARY_API NativeCodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic:Di2015NewLine    NativeCode()Di2015NewLine        :theListener_(NULL)Di2015NewLine    {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Listener registration methodDi2015NewLine    void registerListener(INativeListener* listener) {Di2015NewLine        theListener_ = listener;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this is the very first source of the eventDi2015NewLine    //native code emits the event via the listener mechanismDi2015NewLine    void eventSourceMethod() {Di2015NewLine        //... other stuffDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //fire the native event to be catchedDi2015NewLine        if(theListener_){Di2015NewLine            //prepare event parametersDi2015NewLine            NativeEventArgs args;Di2015NewLine            wstring wstr(L"A wide string");Di2015NewLine            string str("A regular string");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //build-up the argument objectDi2015NewLine            args.argInt32 = 15;Di2015NewLine            args.argString = str.c_str();Di2015NewLine            args.argWString = wstr.c_str();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //fire the event using argumentDi2015NewLine            theListener_->OnEvent( args );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //native code uses a listener object to emit eventsDi2015NewLine    INativeListener* theListener_;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine
9931869Di2015UniqueSeparator//GatewayCode.hDi2015NewLine//GatewayLibrary is the tricky part,Di2015NewLine//Here we listen events from the native libraryDi2015NewLine//and propagate them to .net/clr worldDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#ifndef _GATEWAY_CODE_H_Di2015NewLine#define _GATEWAY_CODE_H_Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include "../NativeLibrary/NativeCode.h" //include native libraryDi2015NewLine#include <vcclr.h> //required for gcrootDi2015NewLineusing namespace System;Di2015NewLineusing namespace System::Runtime::InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace GatewayLibrary{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //.net equvelant of the argument classDi2015NewLine    public ref class DotNetEventArg{Di2015NewLine    internal:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //contructor takes native version of argument to transformDi2015NewLine        DotNetEventArg(const NativeEventArgs& args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //assign primitives naturallyDi2015NewLine            argInt32 = args.argInt32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //convert wide string to CLR stringDi2015NewLine            argWString = Marshal::PtrToStringUni( IntPtr((void*)args.argWString) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //convert 8-bit native string to CLR stringDi2015NewLine            argString = Marshal::PtrToStringAnsi( IntPtr( (void*)args.argString) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //see Marshal class for rich set of conversion methods (e.g. buffers)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        String^ argString;Di2015NewLine        String^ argWString;Di2015NewLine        Int32 argInt32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLine        //define propertiesDi2015NewLine        property String^ ArgString {Di2015NewLine            String^ get() {Di2015NewLine                return argString;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        property String^ ArgWString {Di2015NewLine            String^ get() {Di2015NewLine                return argWString;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        property Int32 ArgInt32 {Di2015NewLine            Int32 get() {Di2015NewLine                return argInt32;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //EventGateway fires .net event when a native event happens.Di2015NewLine    //It is the actual gateway class between Native C++ and .NET world.Di2015NewLine    //In other words, It RECEIVES NATIVE events, TRANSFORMS/SENDS them into CLR.Di2015NewLine    public ref class EventGateway {Di2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //ctor, its implementation placed belowDi2015NewLine        EventGateway();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //required to clean native objectsDi2015NewLine        ~EventGateway();Di2015NewLine        !EventGateway();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //the SENDER partDi2015NewLine        //.net event stuff defined hereDi2015NewLine        delegate void DotNetEventHandler(DotNetEventArg^ arg);Di2015NewLine        event DotNetEventHandler^ OnEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        //our native library codeDi2015NewLine        //notice you can have pointers to native objects in ref classes.Di2015NewLine        NativeCode* nativeCode_; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //the required device to listen events from the native libraryDi2015NewLine        INativeListener* nativeListener_; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal: //hide from .net assemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //the RECEIVER part, called when a native event receivedDi2015NewLine        void OnNativeEvent(const NativeEventArgs& args){Di2015NewLine            //you can make necessary transformation between native types and .net typesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create .net argument using native argumentDi2015NewLine            //required conversion is done by DotNetEventArg classDi2015NewLine            DotNetEventArg^ dotNetArgs = gcnew DotNetEventArg(args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //fire .net eventDi2015NewLine            OnEvent( dotNetArgs );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//A concrete listener class. we need this class to register native library events.Di2015NewLine//Its our second gateway class which connects Native C++ and CLI/C++Di2015NewLine//It basically gets events from NativeLibary and sends them to EventGatewayDi2015NewLineclass NativeListenerImp : public INativeListener {Di2015NewLinepublic:Di2015NewLine    NativeListenerImp(gcroot<GatewayLibrary::EventGateway^> gatewayObj ){Di2015NewLine        dotNetGateway_ = gatewayObj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this is the first place we know that a native event has happenedDi2015NewLine    virtual void OnEvent(const NativeEventArgs& args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //inform the .net gateway which is responsible of transforming native event to .net eventDi2015NewLine        dotNetGateway_->OnNativeEvent(args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate:Di2015NewLine    //class member to trigger .net gateway.Di2015NewLine    //gcroot is required to declare a CLR type as a member of native class.Di2015NewLine    gcroot<GatewayLibrary::EventGateway^> dotNetGateway_;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine////ctor and dtors of EventGateway classDi2015NewLineGatewayLibrary::EventGateway::EventGateway()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    nativeCode_ = new NativeCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //note; using 'this' in ctor is not a good practiceDi2015NewLine    nativeListener_ = new NativeListenerImp(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //register native listenerDi2015NewLine    nativeCode_->registerListener(nativeListener_);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGatewayLibrary::EventGateway::~EventGateway()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //call the non-deterministic destructorDi2015NewLine    this->!EventGateway();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGatewayLibrary::EventGateway::!EventGateway()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //clean up native objectsDi2015NewLine    delete nativeCode_;Di2015NewLine    delete nativeListener_;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine
9931869Di2015UniqueSeparator//Program.csDi2015NewLine//C# the final evet consumer applicationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing GatewayLibrary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SharpClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //create the gatewayDi2015NewLine            EventGateway gateway = new EventGateway();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //listen on .net events using the gatewayDi2015NewLine            gateway.OnEvent += new EventGateway.DotNetEventHandler(gateway_OnEvent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void gateway_OnEvent( DotNetEventArg args )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //use the argument classDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("On Native Event");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(args.ArgInt32);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(args.ArgString);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(args.ArgWString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9932956Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing NHibernate;Di2015NewLineusing NHibernate.Type;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace blaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// NHibernate Interceptor that stores audit information (idlogin and datetime.now) on every save and updateDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class AuditInterceptor : EmptyInterceptorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int updates;Di2015NewLine        private int creates;Di2015NewLine        private int loads;Di2015NewLine        private ISession session;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnDelete(object entity,Di2015NewLine                                      object id,Di2015NewLine                                      object[] state,Di2015NewLine                                      string[] propertyNames,Di2015NewLine                                      IType[] types)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do nothingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool OnFlushDirty(object obj, object id, object[] currentState, object[] previousState, string[] propertyNames, IType[] types)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool found = false;Di2015NewLine            if (obj is Entity)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                updates++;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; 9934288Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TreeBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TreeBuilder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode rootNode = new TreeNode(@"\\");Di2015NewLine        rootNode.Name = @"\\";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RootNode = rootNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode RootNodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddItems(string[] items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.Sort(items);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(RootNode.Name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RootNode.Name = @"\\";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] itemParts = item.Split(new string[] { "@@" }, StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLine            string filePath = itemParts[0].TrimEnd('\\\\');Di2015NewLine            string versionPath = itemParts[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TreeNode fileNode = AddNode(RootNode, filePath);Di2015NewLine            TreeNode versionNode = AddNode(fileNode, filePath + "@@", versionPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode AddNode(TreeNode topNode, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return AddNode(topNode, null, path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeNode AddNode(TreeNode topNode, string pathPrefix, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pathPrefix = pathPrefix ?? string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TreeNode node = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(path) && topNode.Name != path)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string parentPath = Path.GetDirectoryName(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TreeNode[] matchingNodes = topNode.Nodes.Find(pathPrefix + path, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (matchingNodes == null || matchingNodes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string nodeLabel = Path.GetFileName(path);Di2015NewLine                nodeLabel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(nodeLabel) ? @"\\" : nodeLabel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                node = new TreeNode(nodeLabel);Di2015NewLine                node.Name = pathPrefix + path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                TreeNode[] parentNodes = topNode.Nodes.Find(pathPrefix + parentPath, true);Di2015NewLine                TreeNode parentNode = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (parentNodes != null && parentNodes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    parentNode = parentNodes[0];Di2015NewLine                    parentNode.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    parentNode = AddNode(topNode, pathPrefix, parentPath);Di2015NewLine                    parentNode.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node = matchingNodes[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node = topNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9934390Di2015UniqueSeparatorTransactionScope
9934390Di2015UniqueSeparatortryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create the TransactionScope to execute the commands, guaranteeingDi2015NewLine    // that both commands can commit or roll back as a single unit of work.Di2015NewLine    using (TransactionScope scope = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (SqlConnection connection1 = new SqlConnection(connectString1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Opening the connection automatically enlists it in the Di2015NewLine            // TransactionScope as a lightweight transaction.Di2015NewLine            connection1.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the SqlCommand object and execute the first command.Di2015NewLine            SqlCommand command1 = new SqlCommand(commandText1, connection1);Di2015NewLine            returnValue = command1.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command1: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If you get here, this means that command1 succeeded. By nestingDi2015NewLine            // the using block for connection2 inside that of connection1, youDi2015NewLine            // conserve server and network resources as connection2 is openedDi2015NewLine            // only when there is a chance that the transaction can commit.   Di2015NewLine            using (SqlConnection connection2 = new SqlConnection(connectString2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The transaction is escalated to a full distributedDi2015NewLine                // transaction when connection2 is opened.Di2015NewLine                connection2.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Execute the second command in the second database.Di2015NewLine                returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand command2 = new SqlCommand(commandText2, connection2);Di2015NewLine                returnValue = command2.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("Rows to be affected by command2: {0}", returnValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The Complete method commits the transaction. If an exception has been thrown,Di2015NewLine        // Complete is not  called and the transaction is rolled back.Di2015NewLine        scope.Complete();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (TransactionAbortedException ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    writer.WriteLine("TransactionAbortedException Message: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (ApplicationException ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    writer.WriteLine("ApplicationException Message: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9944079Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class MyJsonValueProviderFactory : ValueProviderFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void AddToBackingStore(Dictionary<string, object> backingStore, string prefix, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDictionary<string, object> d = value as IDictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLine        if (d != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> entry in d)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddToBackingStore(backingStore, MakePropertyKey(prefix, entry.Key), entry.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IList l = value as IList;Di2015NewLine        if (l != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < l.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddToBackingStore(backingStore, MakeArrayKey(prefix, i), l[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // primitiveDi2015NewLine        backingStore[prefix] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object GetDeserializedObject(ControllerContext controllerContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.ContentType.StartsWith("application/json", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // not JSON requestDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.InputStream);Di2015NewLine        string bodyText = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(bodyText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // no JSON dataDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        JavaScriptSerializer serializer = new JavaScriptSerializer();Di2015NewLine        serializer.MaxJsonLength = 2147483647;Di2015NewLine        object jsonData = serializer.DeserializeObject(bodyText);Di2015NewLine        return jsonData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IValueProvider GetValueProvider(ControllerContext controllerContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (controllerContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("controllerContext");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object jsonData = GetDeserializedObject(controllerContext);Di2015NewLine        if (jsonData == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string MakeArrayKey(string prefix, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return prefix + "[" + index.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "]";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string MakePropertyKey(string prefix, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (String.IsNullOrEmpty(prefix)) ? propertyName : prefix + "." + propertyName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9949573Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private DoSomething _myEventStorage;Di2015NewLine  public event DoSomething myEventDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    addDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _myEventStorage = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    removeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _myEventStorage -= value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine  public void EventFired()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (_myEventStorage != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _myEventStorage(this, new ChainEventArgs());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9951915Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Calculate X coordinate on an ellipseDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="width">Ellipse width</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="height">Ellipse height</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="y">Y ranging from 0 to height</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>X relative to the center of the ellipse</returns>Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLinestatic float EllipseCalculateX( float width, float height, float y )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( y < 0 || y > height )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    y = y - ( height / 2f );Di2015NewLine    var a = width / 2f;Di2015NewLine    var b = height / 2f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var x = ( a * Math.Sqrt( ( b * b ) - ( y * y ) ) ) / b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (float)x;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnPaint( PaintEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var percent_full = PercentFull;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // length, width, and depth of the storage in pixelsDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var storage_length = 140f;Di2015NewLine    var storage_height = 80f;            Di2015NewLine    var storage_depth  = 15f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var start = new PointF( 80, 50 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cylinder = new RectangleF( start.X, start.Y, storage_length, storage_height );Di2015NewLine    var left_cap = new RectangleF( cylinder.Left - ( storage_depth / 2f ), cylinder.Top, storage_depth, storage_height );Di2015NewLine    var right_cap = new RectangleF( cylinder.Right - ( storage_depth / 2f ), cylinder.Top, storage_depth, storage_height );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // relative x,y of the fill level on the "near" (front) side of the storageDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var fill_near_y = storage_height * ( percent_full / 100f );Di2015NewLine    var fill_near_x = EllipseCalculateX( storage_depth, storage_height, fill_near_y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // relative x,y of the fill level on the "far" (back) side of the storageDi2015NewLine    // y is offset slightly for the 3D effectDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var fill_far_y = storage_height * ( percent_full / 100f ) + ( storage_depth / 2f );Di2015NewLine    var fill_far_x = EllipseCalculateX( storage_depth, storage_height, fill_far_y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // absolute x,y of the fill level on the left side (near and far)Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var fill_left_far = new PointF( cylinder.Left - fill_far_x, cylinder.Bottom - fill_far_y );Di2015NewLine    var fill_left_near = new PointF( cylinder.Left + fill_near_x, cylinder.Bottom - fill_near_y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // absolute x,y of the fill level on the right side (near and far)Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var fill_right_far = new PointF( cylinder.Right - fill_far_x, cylinder.Bottom - fill_far_y );Di2015NewLine    var fill_right_near = new PointF( cylinder.Right + fill_near_x, cylinder.Bottom - fill_near_y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // calculate the slope between the near and far levelsDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var slope = ( fill_left_far.Y - fill_left_near.Y ) / ( fill_left_far.X - fill_left_near.X + 0.001f );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // build a clip path to be used in filling the left cap; its top is angled to match the 3D effectDi2015NewLine    // the first two points in the path have to be extended outside of the cap ellipse, or the fill will look wrong above 50% fillDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var left_clip = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine    left_clip.AddPolygon( new PointF[] {Di2015NewLine        new PointF( left_cap.Left, fill_left_far.Y - ( slope * ( fill_left_far.X - left_cap.Left ) ) ), Di2015NewLine        new PointF( left_cap.Right, fill_left_near.Y + ( slope * ( left_cap.Right - fill_left_near.X ) ) ), Di2015NewLine        new PointF( left_cap.Right, left_cap.Bottom ), Di2015NewLine        new PointF( left_cap.Left, left_cap.Bottom ),Di2015NewLine    } );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // same for right capDi2015NewLine    // Di2015NewLine    var right_clip = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine    right_clip.AddPolygon( new PointF[] {Di2015NewLine        new PointF( right_cap.Left, fill_right_far.Y - ( slope * ( fill_right_far.X - right_cap.Left ) ) ), Di2015NewLine        new PointF( right_cap.Right, fill_right_near.Y + ( slope * ( right_cap.Right - fill_right_near.X ) )),Di2015NewLine        new PointF( right_cap.Right, left_cap.Bottom ), Di2015NewLine        new PointF( right_cap.Left, right_cap.Bottom ),Di2015NewLine    } );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var outline = new Pen( Color.Black, 2f ) { LineJoin = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin.Bevel };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // outline the top and bottom of the storageDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.DrawLine( outline, cylinder.Left, cylinder.Top, cylinder.Right, cylinder.Top );Di2015NewLine    g.DrawLine( outline, cylinder.Left, cylinder.Bottom, cylinder.Right, cylinder.Bottom );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // outline the right capDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.DrawEllipse( outline, right_cap );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // outline and fill the right sideDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.SetClip( right_clip );Di2015NewLine    g.DrawEllipse( outline, right_cap );Di2015NewLine    g.FillEllipse( Brushes.Orange, right_cap );Di2015NewLine    g.ResetClip();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // fill in the center areaDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.SetClip( RectangleF.FromLTRB( cylinder.Left, fill_left_near.Y, cylinder.Right, cylinder.Bottom ) );Di2015NewLine    g.FillRectangle( Brushes.Orange, cylinder );Di2015NewLine    g.ResetClip();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // fill left sideDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.SetClip( left_clip );Di2015NewLine    g.FillEllipse( Brushes.Yellow, left_cap );Di2015NewLine    g.ResetClip();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // outline and fill the surfaceDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    var surface = new[] { fill_left_near, fill_left_far, fill_right_far, fill_right_near, fill_left_near };Di2015NewLine    g.DrawPolygon( outline, surface );Di2015NewLine    g.FillPolygon( Brushes.Yellow, surface );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // outline the left capDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    g.DrawEllipse( outline, left_cap 9955495Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class SingletonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     private static Hashtable bindings = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine     private static Hashtable instances = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private static void checkType(Type requested, Type bound)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (requested.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Cannot bind a value type to a reference type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // also check type inheritance and other things...Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private static void checkBinding(Type requested)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (!(bindings.ContainsKey(requested)))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(String.Format("Type {0} was not bound !", requested.FullName));Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public static void Bind<T, U>() where U : class, new() Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        checkType(typeof(T), typeof(U));Di2015NewLine        bindings[typeof(T)] = typeof(U);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public static T GetInstance<T>() Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Type requested = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        Type bound = (Type) bindings[requested];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        checkBinding(requested);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!instances.ContainsKey(requested)) {Di2015NewLine            // We know that type "bound" was set with a new() class constraintDi2015NewLine            instances[requested] = (T) Activator.CreateInstance(bound);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (T) instances[requested];Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9957710Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void sortArray(int[] array) {Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine    int largest = array[i];Di2015NewLine    int largeIndex = i;Di2015NewLine    for (int j = i + 1; j < array.Length; j++) {Di2015NewLine      if (array[j] > largest) {Di2015NewLine        largeIndex = j;Di2015NewLine        largest = array[j];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    array[largeIndex] = array[i];Di2015NewLine    array[i] = largest;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9957710Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void sortArray(int[] array) {Di2015NewLine  bool cont = true;Di2015NewLine  while (cont) {Di2015NewLine    cont = false;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < array.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      if (array[i - 1] > array[i]) {Di2015NewLine        cont = true;Di2015NewLine        int temp = array[i - 1];Di2015NewLine        array[i - 1] = array[i];Di2015NewLine        array[i] = temp;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9958340Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExampleServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly AutoResetEvent TimerLatch = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private static readonly AutoResetEvent ShutdownLatch = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Timer MyTimer = new Timer(TimerTick);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var t = new Thread(DoLoop);Di2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MyTimer.Change(0, 500);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ShutdownLatch.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TimerTick(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TimerLatch.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DoLoop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (WaitHandle.WaitAny(new[] { TimerLatch, ShutdownLatch }) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The timer ticked, do something timer relatedDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We are shutting down, do whatever cleanup you needDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9966015Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void CallPluginMethod(string param)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     // Is MyDLL.Dll in current directory ??? Di2015NewLine     // Probably it's better to call Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location but....Di2015NewLine     string libToCheck = Path.Combine(Environment.CurrentDirectory, "MyDLL.dll");  Di2015NewLine     Assembly a = Assembly.LoadFile(libToCheck);Di2015NewLine     string typeAssembly = "MyDll.MyClass"; // Is this namespace correct ???Di2015NewLine     Type c = a.GetType(typeAssembly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Get all method infos for public non static methods Di2015NewLine     MethodInfo[] miList = c.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public|BindingFlags.Instance|BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLine     // Search the one required  (could be optimized with Linq?)Di2015NewLine     foreach(MethodInfo mi in miList)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         if(mi.Name == "MyMethod")Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             // Create a MyClass object supposing it has an empty constructorDi2015NewLine             ConstructorInfo clsConstructor = c.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine             object myClass = clsConstructor.Invoke(new object[]{});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             // check how many parameters are requiredDi2015NewLine             if(mi.GetParameters().Length == 1)Di2015NewLine                 // call the new interface Di2015NewLine                 mi.Invoke(myClass, new object[]{param});Di2015NewLine             else Di2015NewLine                 // call the old interface or give out an exceptionDi2015NewLine                 mi.Invoke(myClass, null);Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9969650Di2015UniqueSeparator  var uniqueList = myMainListDi2015NewLine      .Concat(myAddList)Di2015NewLine      .DistinctBy(item => item.MyGuid)Di2015NewLine      .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IEnumerable<T> DistinctBy<T, TKey>(this IEnumerable<T> items, Di2015NewLine                    Func<T, TKey> keyer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var set = new HashSet<TKey>();Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var key = keyer(item);Di2015NewLine      if (set.Contains(key))Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine      list.Add(item);Di2015NewLine      set.Add(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

9969828Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var accessToken = GetAccessToken();Di2015NewLine        Authorize(accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Access token is " + accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fileToUpload = @"C:\\Program Files\\Common Files\\Microsoft Shared\\ink\\en-US\\join.avi";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("File to upload is " + fileToUpload);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var uploadUrl = GetFileUploadUrl(accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Posting to " + uploadUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = GetFileUploadResponse(fileToUpload, accessToken, uploadUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Response:\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(response + "\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Publishing video.\\n");Di2015NewLine        var uploadedResponse = PublishVideo(response, accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(uploadedResponse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done. Press enter to exit.");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static UploadResponse GetFileUploadResponse(string fileToUpload, string accessToken, string uploadUrl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        client.Headers.Add("Authorization", "OAuth " + accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var responseBytes = client.UploadFile(uploadUrl, fileToUpload);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var responseString = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(responseBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<UploadResponse>(responseString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static UploadedResponse PublishVideo(UploadResponse uploadResponse, string accessToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = WebRequest.Create("https://api.dailymotion.com/me/videos?url=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(uploadResponse.url));Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request.Headers.Add("Authorization", "OAuth " + accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestString = String.Format("title={0}&tags={1}&channel={2}&published={3}",Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode("some title"),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode("tag1"),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode("news"),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode("true"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(requestString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        requestStream.Write(requestBytes, 0, requestBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        string responseString;Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            responseString = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var uploadedResponse = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<UploadedResponse>(responseString);Di2015NewLine        return uploadedResponse;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetAccessToken()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = WebRequest.Create("https://api.dailymotion.com/oauth/token");Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestString = String.Format("grant_type=password&client_id={0}&client_secret={1}&username={2}&password={3}",Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.Key),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.Secret),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.Username),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.Password));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(requestString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var requestStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        requestStream.Write(requestBytes, 0, requestBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        string responseString;Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            responseString = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var oauthResponse = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<OAuthResponse>(responseString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return oauthResponse.access_token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Authorize(string accessToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var authorizeUrl = String.Format("https://api.dailymotion.com/oauth/authorize?response_type=code&client_id={0}&scope=read+write+manage_videos+delete&redirect_uri={1}",Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.Key),Di2015NewLine            HttpUtility.UrlEncode(SettingsProvider.CallbackUrl));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("We need permissions to upload. Press enter to open web browser.");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Process.Start(authorizeUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        client.Headers.Add("Authorization", "OAuth " + accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Press enter once you have authenticated and been redirected to your callback URL");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetFileUploadUrl(string accessToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        client.Headers.Add("Authorization", "OAuth " + accessToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var urlResponse = client.DownloadString("https://api.dailymotion.com/file/upload");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<UploadRequestResponse>(urlResponse).upload_url;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
